Your parents had just left for the week and you were ready to relax and have a good time.

The only thing was you had to look after your little brother Connor. You and your brother didn't have the greatest relationship. You never really spent much time together. When you do spend time together, things usually don't go well. You and Connor usually get into fights. You like to make fun of how short he his compared to you as well. You know he gets annoyed by it so it's that much funnier to you.

Presently, you were playing video games in the living room when your brother came in and said, "John, I want to try and get along this week. We have an opportunity to bond, so I was wondering if you wanted to play a game with me?"

Remaining focused on your video game, you said, "Go away midget, I'm busy. Go play a game on your own."

Connor looked at you and said, "Please, I really want to play with you! We have the whole week alone together and I don't want to spend it by myself. I want to spend more time with you!" You then looked at him and said, "Connor, get out of here, I don't want to play with you! I'm just trying to relax this week. Please go away!" Connor muttered to himself, "I'm just trying to be nice. Why are you so mean?" Unfortunately for him, you heard him say that and you responded, "I'm not mean, your just annoying Connor. You are always trying to get me to play with you when I'm always busy and then you annoy me about it. I wouldn't want to hang out with a shrimp like you any way. So, for the last time, go away!"

After, Connor went to his room. He was upset that you didn't want to do anything with him. He was also upset that you kept making fun of his size. Connor had enough of it though. He wouldn't tolerate being made fun of by you anymore. He wanted to show you that he wasn't as small as you kept saying he was. While he was in his room, Connor went over to his closet and pulled out a box in the back.

"This’ll show him,," Connor said as he took out...

After awhile, you return to the room with a pair of shoes, your size 11 Nikes as well as your pair of socks. He puts your shoe against his own foot, sole against sole, it barely reaching half of his foot. You then tell Connor to put his foot over your shoe, you see that his big foot covers your entire shoe completely. "Why don't you try putting it on?" you asked.

He obliged, taking the undersized shoe and putting his foot in it. However, his foot was too wide for the mouth of the shoe, it couldn't even fit into the shoe! That was when you thought of a bright idea. "Hey, why don't we shrink your feet down to normal size first, wear it, then we grow your feet back!" "Nice! Let's do that then." You then shrink Connor's feet back to size 13, then he gingerly put your shoes on over his still bigger feet. It was a tight fit, but there was enough room to squeeze his feet in. Aiming the ray gun at his feet, you fired till his feet grew back to size 35.

Looking at the shoes, you slowly see a bulge forming at the tip of the shoes as you see the outline of his toes. The bulge at the sides of the shoes also grew bigger continuously. Suddenly, the sounds of fabric ripping fill the air as you see his toes break through the front of the shoe, it being unable to contain the huge foot behind it. The shoes slowly tearing at the sides as well as the foot grew larger and larger. You hear the laces on your Nike snap as his foot was growing too wide for it to be able to hold to the shoes together.

Finally, the growth ended. You see that his foot has completely decimated the top of the shoe; laces all over the floor, the fabric in tatters. The soles of the shoe were stuck completely beneath his hefty soles. You were simply awestruck by the magnificent display in front of you. You tell Connor to lift up his soles as you take the insole of your shoe, putting it against Connor's foot. His toes - no, the whole arch of his foot jutted out of the rubber insole. You stare in amazement. You could also see that Connor was staring at the whole scene with disbelief.

Wanting to make this even more exciting, you quickly hand Connor the sock, to which when fully stretched against his long soles, could only reach a third of its length. You shrink Connor's feet back down again, and he rushed to put your socks on his feet, clearly unable to wait any longer to grow out of it. It fit him perfectly with room to spare, "Not for long." you thought to yourself. Aiming it at his feet once more, you fire the ray gun.

You start to see the shape of his toes develop at the edge of the sock as his foot quickly fills the empty spaces in the sock. You see his foot inch across the floor, the sock following suit, stretching as it struggles desperately to contain the growing giant foot within. You stop shooting the gun at his feet for awhile. You admire his feet as the socks have stretched paper thin across it. Attempting to pull it, you fail as it was already skin tight on Connor's foot. His widened foot strained the top of the socks. The mouth of the sock slid down all the way to his heels, barely clinging on to his foot. He signals you to carry on, to which you proceed. Immediately, you hear tearing sounds as his toes bust through the tip of the socks, growing further as the socks can't hold them in anymore. The top of the sock splits, unable to contain the widening foot within. The bottom of the sock tears as well, revealing his growing soles once more. Reaching to his magnificent size 35 again, remnants of the socks were strewn all around his feet. Some fabric still clung onto his feet, though it was stretched to distortion already. Both you and Connor both exclaimed, "Wow!" as you were both at a loss for words at the wondrous sight. Deciding what to do next,

John looked up. Connor was so massive and so handsome. What could be possibly want with John? “So you’re going to keep me?”

Connor smiled. His brother was in his hand with nowhere to go and he couldn’t be happier. “Not just keep you - I’m going to date you! If you’re not my brother you can be my boyfriend” Connor said as he kissed John again. He could do whatever he wanted to John and John was going to let him. Which gave him an idea.

Connor bent down and with one massive hand ripped all the barbed wire off of the prision at his feet. He took the wire and fastened it around John under his arms and then turned John into a necklace for him to wear. Then Connor laughed amused.

You actually got a little excited after Connor said that. You were kind of curious about what was going on. You’ve never really been into feet before, but here you were excited to be close to your younger brother’s! Was it because of this whole shrinking situation? If Connor made you smaller would you become more obsessed?

112323.content:
"Hmm, with this shrink ray, I can think of plenty of games we can play..." Connor said, smiling down at you sadistically. Looking up at your giant brother in pure fear, you began to regret agreeing to his form of play.

"For starters, we should play a game of Outrun The Giant!" Connor dictated, his evil grin only widening as he reads the terror in your eyes.

*GULP* You swallow in fear, knowing full well that your brother was here for revenge.

"The rules are easy, just don't end up under these feet! You have five minutes!" Connor said, lifting his foot off the floor slightly to let you see the dirt and grime trapped on his sole, and possibly foreshadowing your fate if you lose this game.

"You win, I grow you back to normal and destroy the shrink ray, but if I win... you have to become my slave and do what I ever I ask you to do!" Connor said, as you looked at him in disbelief.

"Now, I know it isn't easy so I've decided to give you a bit of an advantage!" Connor proceeded to pull something out of his pocket. At first, it looked like he simply pulled out his key chain but upon further observation, mangled between the keys, you see your gas scooter!

"Whoops!" Connor looks at the thing, which has clearly seen better days, before unceremoniously dumping it before you. "Oh well! It's hard for big kids like me to be careful with bug-sized things!" Connor joked, as you ran to it to assess the damage. Besides the fact that it needed a new paintjob and new mirrors, it seemed to work okay. Still, when you got back to normal, you would beat your brother into a concussion.

Before you had a chance to rip him a new asshole, your brother told you to get ready as he gave you a 10 second head start. You started the moped and pushed the throttle as far as it could go. In the background, you could hear Connor counting down as you sped across the hardwood floor, your tires struggling to hold their traction on the varnish. You barely make it out of the room as you hear.

"TWO! ONE! READY OR NOT, HERE I COME!" Connor says, as he stomps off after you, making sure to place extra emphasis on his foot falls. Looking through the rearview, you can see the massive, dirty soles closing the distance, and he wasn't even running! Knowing full well you didn't stand a chance, you would have to rely on tick maneuvers in order to evade his filthy feet. Pulling a 180°, you blast right between his ankles, holding your breath through the cloud of foot stink.

Connor is caught off guard by the move, and his demeanor goes from playful to aggravated really quickly. "GET BACK HERE! YOU STILL HAVE NO CHANCE! YOU MIGHT AS WELL ACCEPT YOU PLACE BENEATH ME!" Connor says, giving chase even faster than before. He quickly catches up to you, preparing to stop you with one swift stomp, when suddenly, his second left foot betrays him. He loses his balance and falls back on his ass giving you just enough time to clear the mayhem. Looking down at your wrist, you see there is thirty seconds left as you desperately try to stay out of his radius. In your rear view, you can see Connor has picked himself off the floor and is closing in fast on your location. You pushed the moped faster than it was designed for hoping it works out.

What happens?

It's easier for you to massage them now anyway."

Meanwhile, Connor was starting to get a little bored of the foot massage, he wanted to do something else with you. So he moved his feet away from you and picked you up in his hand. You were so light to him due to how small you were. You could easily stand in the palm of his hand too. His finger's looked huge to you, they were about your size! After you were done looking around at Connor's hand you said to him, "Why did you pick me up?" He looked down at you and said, "I thought we could do something else, how about we..."
1313211.title: Continued the massage

choices: Ask Connor to shrink you more
13132111.content:
"How about we calm down with the whole serving thing, let's just hang out." You were surprised when you heard Connor say this, you had just been rubbing his feet, like a servant, not even a minute ago. Now he just wants to hang out. You asked him, "What do you want to do Connor?" He responded, "We can just watch TV and order a pizza, do you want to do that?" You liked the sound of that. You said, "That sounds great! So can you return me to my normal size?" Connor laughed and said, "That's not going to happen, I want you to stay small, its too much fun with you at this size right now."

Connor put you down on the ground by his feet and walked over to the kitchen. When he walked, there were little vibrations after each of his steps, probably due to how big his feet were compared to you. His big toe was a quarter of your size after all! Connor called the pizza guy, while you were still running to the kitchen trying to keep up.

Connor came back, picked you up, and put you on the couch and he sat down next to you. He turned the TV on and got up to go to the front door to get the pizza. You looked around at how big everything was. You couldn't believe the size of everything! Your brother especially, he was like a moving building! You were starting to think that being your current size was kind of cool. Maybe you didn't mind it that much, maybe you liked it a little bit.

Eating the pizza was a little difficult for you. Connor had to feed you, in his terms, crumbs. It was still good. You looked up to your giant little brother and said, "Hey Connor, after spending some time at this size, it is kind of cool how you shrunk me! It's cool seeing everything as big as it is!" Connor responded, "I'm sure it's cool! I probably look huge to you!" You agreed that he did.

You and Connor continued to watch TV for a while. You started thinking about your size a little bit while you were watching, glancing over at Connor while you did. Maybe you liked being this size, you might actually want to be a little smaller thanks to your curiosity. You looked down at your brother's feet and wondered if you should ask Connor to shrink you more or to just forget about the whole thing and continue to watch TV.

What did you do?
13132111.title: Hang out, watch tv and stuff

131321111.content:
You looked up at Connor and asked, "Hey Connor, exactly how small can I get?" Connor looked down at you and said, "There isn't a size limit John, I could make you microscopic if I wanted to, but I'm not going to do that." You both turned back to the TV. You wanted to ask Connor to shrink you again, but you didn't know how to word it exactly.

It took another few minutes, but you came up with an idea of how to ask him. So, you looked up to Connor once again and asked, "Hey Connor, how small do you think I am right now?" Connor responded, "You were half the size of my foot the last time I checked, so you might be around 4 or 5 inches tall." You responded, "Is that too big to sit on your big toe and watch TV?" Connor got a perplexed look on his face when you asked this. "Um, I think so, why do you ask John?" You took a deep breath and asked, "Do you think you can shrink me more so I can sit on the top of your big toe to watch TV?" Connor laughed at this and said, "Did you actually fall in love with my feet during that massage John?" You got nervous as you said, "No, I'm just curious about shrinking more and I want to try it again." You were nervous because you knew that Connor knew that you did in fact did fall in love with his feet and you wanted to spend more time with them. Connor smiled and said, "Sure John, I'll shrink you more so you can sit on my big toe." You got so happy when Connor said this. You were actually excited to shrink more!

Connor plucked you off the couch and placed you back on his right foot. You had to climb a little bit to get up to his toes but soon you were up standing next to your brother's big toe. Connor then told you, "Are you ready John? Your going to have to be sure to be on top of my toe when you get small enough or it could be quite the climb to get up there once you get too small." You looked up at your brother and said, "I'll be sure to be in the right place. I'm ready." Once you said that your brother focused on you becoming smaller and the shrinking started once again. It was hard to focus while you felt all light headed due to the shrinking, but you made sure to be in the right place at the right time. When you were about the same height as your brother's big toe, you made sure to climb on top of it. After, you just stood on top of the toe and watched as everything became bigger and bigger. You looked down at your feet on top of your brother's big toe and saw the toe grow larger around you.

Soon, the shrinking slowed down and you couldn't believe your surroundings when it stopped. The top of Connor's big toe was as big as your bedroom! You got on your knees and looked over the edge to see the rest of your brother's foot. You couldn't believe how high up you were. Connor's foot had to be like a two story building compared to you! Then you turned around to look at the rest of your brother! You gasped as you saw Connor as tall as a mountain compared to you! That's when Connor leaned forward to get a better look at you. His face got closer and closer and you could really tell how much bigger he was than before. His face was ginormous! His eyes were the size of mansions! Connor looked at his big toe to make sure you were there, and he saw the shape of a tiny human standing on top of it. "Thank god your alright John! You have to be like 1/4 or 1/8 of an inch tall now!" When Connor said this, you had to cover your ears. His voice was so loud! Connor saw that you had to do this and said, "Oh my voice must be really loud to you at this size, sorry! Well, you got what you wanted John! I hope you can see the TV well from my toe!"

You remembered that is why you asked to be shrunk. You turned around and looked up at the TV and it looked so far away now. It was enormous though, like everything else. You laid down on your brother's toe and watched. You and Connor continued to watch TV for a while longer. You heard Connor yawn and say, "Well, I don't know about you John but I'm kind of tired. I'm going to go to bed." After he said this he reached down to his toe and plucked you off. His finger's were as big small buildings themselves! He placed you in the palm of his hand, which looked as big as 2 football fields in each direction to you, and started to walk to his room. He looked down at you on his hand and said, "I think it's best if you sleep in my room tonight John, considering your size. Where should I put you though?" You looked up to your brother and yelled that you wanted to be put...
131321111.title: Ask Connor to shrink you more

choices: Connor wakes up in a bad mood
Connor accidentally shrinks you more over night
1313211111.content:
"I want to sleep in between your toes, if that's alright with you..." you admit, slightly embarrassed at your own request. Your brother happily obliges, seemingly unfazed by your odd request. "Alright, but should we make you a little bigger? I don't want you accidentally slipping away and getting lost! It'll be impossible to find you at that size!" You reassure Connor that everything will be fine and you begin your trek through the giant canyon that is actually just the space between a preteen boys toes.

Connor can't help but giggle as he watches his near microscopic older brother find a comfortable spot to sleep between his toes. As with most preteen boys, Connor is quite active, and while he may have looked sweet and innocent, he knew his feet were anything but. He was often teased at school for his rancid foot odor, due mainly to his tendency to wear shoes without socks. Thinking of this, he kinda felt bad about keeping his brother between his toes, even if it was his choice. Still, his older brother seemed to really like his feet, and he was happy that they were at least spending time together. Connor quickly drifts off to sleep tired from such a great day.

Meanwhile, you were in awe of the world you found yourself in. At 1/8 of an inch tall, you were barely bigger than the accumulation of grime and dead skin that call this pit home. The odor was quite potent, but you found it comforting. In an odd sense, it smelled like home, or at the most, Connors' room. As you are trekking though the toe space, you notice some of the strange things built up between your brothers toes. Although it mostly seems to be dirt and lint, you can also make out what seems to be food crumbs between his toes. Although you weren't hungry up until now, sighting that giant piece of bread made you realize how long it has been since you've eaten a meal. Deciding it was as good a meal as any, you approach the piece of bread, which nearly rivaled your height, and took a handful. Connor must have steeped on this pretty recently as the crumb broke apart fairly easy. As you sink your teeth into it, you quickly realize that it only came apart easily due to how saturated in Connors' rancid sweat. While it wasn't completely terrible, you would be sure to ask for real food in the morning.

After your meal, you start to accumulate some of the toe crud into a pillow so you can get to sleep. Once you've accumulated a decent amount, you lay in near the giant crumb of bread, in case you get hungry again. Laying between your giagantic brothers' toes, you think about all the times you brush him off, or tease him for being so small. You didn't mean for you guys to drift so far apart, it was just that the large age gap made it difficult to find common interests. You were happy that you guys found a way to spend tine together that you can both enjoy, and with these happy thoughts, and the smell of puberty in the air, it wasn't long before you fell asleep as well...
1313211111.title: In between his toes

13132111111.content:
You woke up the next morning having one of best night sleeps you've had in a while. You sat up and looked at your surroundings, you remained in the same toe gap that you did when you went to sleep last night. As far as you could tell, you had remained the same size also. It was still dark though, so you could only assume that Connor was still in bed. There was no point in trying to contact him from your current position.

You sat down and began to think. You were amazed at your current situation. You were currently sitting in between your younger, 12 year old brother's toes after he had shrunk you there the day before. You even asked him to shrink you more. It was amazing that you used to make fun of how small he was compared to you. How was it possible that you were actually bigger than him at one point, based on where you are sitting now? It's amazing how one day can change your perspective on things. You had a lot of fun with Connor yesterday, and you guys still had plenty of more time to spend together.

What happened next?
13132111111.title: Good morning!

choices: Connor waits to change your size again
131321111111.content:
While you were deep in thought about what you and Connor could do today. You felt Connor's foot move, but it felt more like an earthquake to you. All of a sudden, you were exposed to a blinding light. You couldn't see a thing, you wondered what could be the source of that blinding light. You just wanted to know what was going on!

In reality, the source of the light was just the Sun. Connor had woken up and gotten out of bed. He sat up and put his feet on the ground. He had a great night sleep. He dreamt of having more fun with his older brother after what happened yesterday. That's when he remembered that his brother was still on his foot! He concentrated on growing him a little so that he could see him and talk to him.

You all of a sudden felt light headed because you started to grow. You saw your surroundings get smaller and the crumb you used as a pillow started to get too small to see. When the growth was over, you stood on your brother's foot at about 6 inches tall.

You looked up at him and smiled. He was no where near as big as he was just a minute ago, but he was still much bigger than you. You were only eye level with his ankle anyway.

Connor asked you how you slept and you said it was a great night sleep. He said he slept well too. He bent down and picked you up with his hand. You stood in the palm of his hand as he walked into the living room and sat down on the couch.

Connor said, "That was fun yesterday! I can't believe how small you were when we went to sleep John." You responded, "I know, you should have seen how big you looked to me. You were like a living, moving skyscraper. It was incredible!" You guys continued to talk more about the fun you had yesterday and the constant size changes Connor made to you.

When Connor asked you if you wanted to continue having fun changing your size, you said you did want to continue. Connor was so happy that you were having a good time with it and was excited to continue.

What happens next?
131321111111.title: Connor woke up

1313211111112.content:
Connor said to you, "I'm happy that you still want to hang out with me John, and I like that your enjoying the size changes!" You responded, ""I know, I can't wait for more." Connor then told you, "I'm actually want to wait to change your size again. I think we need to have some fun first, you're actually the perfect size to play some games right now!"

You thought a game sounded fun, you asked Connor what he had in mind. He said...
1313211111112.title: Connor waits to change your size again

13132111111121.content:
Connor said, “What about hide and seek? You’d probably be really good at it at your size.” You thought about it, and you agreed with Connor. You would be good right now! You told Connor, “Alright Connor, let’s play!” Connor said, “Awesome! I think there should be a reward for the winner though. The winner gets decide what size you’ll be next.” You said, “That sounds good, I’ll hide.”

Connor placed you on the ground and told you that you have 2 minutes to hide. He’ll close his eyes and count. When Connor starts counting you take off running. You really wanted to win, you didn’t really want Connor to choose what size you’d be next. He’d probably make you smaller than you were last night!

You run out of the living room and think about where you want to hide.

Where do you decide to hide?
13132111111121.title: Hide and Seek

choices: You successfully hide, and beat your brother!
Your brother finds you, you're at his mercy.
131321111111213.content:
Looking around your house, you think of the best place to hide. While you didn't mind shrinking any smaller, your competitive side wasn't going to let you lose to Connor so easily. Making your way through the hallway, you notice there is a gap between the cabinets that you could easily fit into at this size. Knowing that Connor would have a pretty rough time reaching you in there, you decide to use it as your hiding spot. As you enter the narrow corridor that is the gap, you can hear Connor booming from what seems like at least a mile to you "Ready or not, here I come!"

In your little hiding spot, you can only hear the slapping of Connors' bare feet hitting the tiles below. You hear doors frantically being opened, each time getting closer and closer to the kitchen. Finally, Connor lands in the only place he hasn't checked yet, the kitchen.

From your view, you see his strong, muscular lower legs and they command the floor between him, unknowingly stepping on a stale cracker that must have fallen earlier this week. You watch as the cracker pretty much disintegrates under his weight, crumbs falling from beneath his plump sole with each step he takes. As his sole lifts from the dirty floor, you notice his soles are pretty darkened from the dust and dirt that litter the house. It was beginning to show that there were no parents to clean this house.

With less than a minute left to go, you break your focus off the gargantuan sole of your younger brother and try to focus on winning the game. You slowly recede further into your nook and hope that your giant younger brother doesn't find you. With seconds left to go...
131321111111213.title: Somewhere else

1313211111112132.content:
Unfortunately, despite your best efforts, you watch as your, brothers unkempt feet change direction, heading directly for the vast canyon you chose as your hiding spot. Hoping that perhaps he still doesn't know where you are, your hopes are dashed as the monolithic feet before you shift, as all his weight is rested on his toes. You watch as his billboard sized face comes into view, smiling mischieviously before screaming excitedly

"FOUND YOU!"

Unfortunately, the relatively cramped space leaves no room for his rancid morning breath to escape, leaving you to deal with it in all it's glory. Your eyes water as you fall over backwards.

"I have to say this was a pretty good spot, almost didn't think you'd be brave enough considering the mouse hole right behind you!" Connor teases, knowing full well there is no mouse hole there. It was still enough to fool you, as you picked your ass up and ran without looking to exactly where Connor wanted you, between his big and second toe of his right foot! Connor laughs hysterically as a wad of toe crud breaks your fall.

Within seconds, that piece of crud is expanding rapidly as the sinking feeling returns. The once homogeneous piece of toe jam becomes less uniform as you dwindle smaller. What used to look like oversized sock lint to you at 6 inches tall begins to look more like an oozing monstrosity to you, as you can make out dead skin and crumbs, mixed in with a little dirt from the front yard.

You stop shrinking at 1/4th of an inch tall, double the size you fell asleep at last night, yet too small to be noticed by anyone who didn't know about you in the first place. Little more than a prisoner inbetween your brothers toes, you can do nothing else but wait in the rancid, humid canyon as your brother walks over to the sofa without addressing you. When he finally reaches the sofa, he lifts his right foot onto his lefts leg, and almost feels bad as he sees how vile his feet look. Breaking the silence, Connor finally decides to break down his plan for the day.

"Hmm, what should I do with my mite sized brother?" He teases, smiling down mischevioulsly as he speaks.

"Maybe I can grow you just a little and have you clean my filthy feet, like a spa day!" Connor suggests, which doesn't seem that awful to you, considering the night you spent at those same feet last night.

"That, or you could help me brush my teeth at your size, I'm sure my breath must be awful right now!" It was. Somehow, even from between his rank toes, the smell of morning breath was overpowering! To top it all off, you were sure he brushed them last night!

"Or maybe you have something better. Your choice!" Connor exclaimed, leaving the fate of the day in your hands.
1313211111112132.title: Your brother finds you, you're at his mercy.

13132111111121321.content:
"First, let's grow you back a little so we can decide!" Connor loudly states as you feel your body slowly expand until you are roughly 8 times your size, around 2 inches tall. The moment you are sure he can hear you, you let him know your decision.

"I'm okay with the first option!" You scream out eagerly, not wanting to be anywhere near his mouth until he brushes his teeth.

"Okay, wait right here while I go and get some equipment!" Connor says as he places you down on the coffee table, next to a plate of chips left over from last night. Pretty hungry from your escapades of the night before, you reach one of the massive potato slices and begin to fill your stomach.

A short while later, your brother returns with your moms' foot bath and pedicure kit. Without warning, he places all the equipment next to you, leaving you to dodge containers of soap and foot rasps larger than you. As you finally manage to reach a safe point away from the downpour of beauty products, you fail to notice that you are about to run direct into the arch of Connors dirty sole. Before you can even brace for impact however, you notice the massive black walls are moving inwards, bringing you along for the ride. You are dragged back the the beauty products by your brothers filthy foot, coating you full of dirt and crumbs, before you end up face first into a bottle of lotion. Before you even have a chance to regain your breath, you feel that familiar sinking feeling as your brother grows you to about 10 inches in height while shrinking everything else to be beneficial to your size. He sets his feet into the bath before grabbing you and throwing you in there along with them. As your body hits the already darkened water, Connor looks down at you and teases

"You need a bath just as much as they do!" You see him smirking before his enormous right foot blocks out the view and pins you underwater. You pound on the giant foot trying to get the young giant to release you to no avail. He is having too much fun humiliating you in the foot bath. Gripping you between his toes, he pulls your tiny self from the water and dumps your body on the edge of the foot bath before placing his long soles in front of you.

"Time to clean!" Connor exclaims and he begins to pour soap all over his slender soles. Knowing what to do next, you approach the young feet and begin to rub the soap into every crevice. You carefully run your arms between every toe, scooping out every last vile bit of toe crud. Before long, you are covered in the stuff, yet all you can smell is the smell of the lavender in the foot soap.

Connor laughs at you covered in his crud and decides to return the favor by lathering you up between his feet and washing you with them in the water. He brings you back up and you begin to remove the dead skin from his soles, which wasn't much, given his age. Before long, it's time to clean his toenails. You reach your arm beneath them in order to remove the gunk that is stuck between them but Connor yelps in pain.

"OUCH! I think you're a bit to big for that! I'll just have to...
13132111111121321.title: Tiny pedicure artist

choices: You'd get to decide what your next size would be
Not really a prize, you're still at Connor's mercy
131321111111213211.content:
"OUCH! I think you're a bit too big for that! I'll just have to make you a lot smaller!" Right after Connor finished his sentence, you began to have the sinking feeling and you saw Connor's toes grow bigger and bigger before you. You wondered how small Connor was going to make you to get all the gunk out from underneath his toe nails. Was he going to make you small enough so you could just walk underneath and get it all no problem? Or was he going to make you so small that it would be like working in a mine, removing each piece of gunk piece by piece? You continued to shrink smaller and smaller until you got your answer.

Once the shrinking was over, you could easily fit underneath your brother's toe nail. It wasn't like a mine, but it would be no easy task though. You looked at the task in front of you and you knew that it would take at least a few minutes to get the gunk out from underneath each of Connor's toenails. You heard your brother say, "There, now you should be able to clean underneath there without hurting me. If I had to guess you'd be about 1/32 of an inch 'little' bro!" At the size you were now, you could be the foot slave of yourself just a minute ago.

You decided to get to work. Luckily, Connor had shrunk down some of the tools you were using before to help you with your task. That way it wouldn't take as long and would be a little bit easier. You took one of tools he'd shrunk down and started getting all of the gunk trapped underneath his toenails out. You then rubbed the soap onto the underside of the nail and the toe itself once the gunk was gone. Connor couldn't really feel you doing this, but he saw his toenails looking a lot cleaner as you went along.

Soon enough, you were finished cleaning Connor's toenails. You were covered in soap and toe jam but the job was finished. Connor's feet definitely smelled a lot better than they did yesterday.

"Good job little bro!" Connor said as he saw that all of his toes had been cleaned. He said, "I think you deserve a prize!" You got all excited as you wondered what your prize would be.

What was it?
131321111111213211.title: Make you a lot smaller

choices: Hang out at a friends house
1313211111112132112.content:
"I think you should be right there as they get all dirty again!" Connor says with a slight chuckle as he reaches over for his shoes, a pair of slip-on vans he tends to wear sockless. If he could see, your face right now, he'd see that you are in agony. You are 1/32nd of an inch tall under the stadium like toenail of your little brothers' smallest toe. At least it was clean for now, until he puts his feet into those wretched shoes!

"Connor please! I did what you asked! You can't do this! It isn't fair!" You attempted to plea with the deity of boy, to no avail. At your minute size, there is no way he'd hear you from down at his freshly cleaned feet. Regardless, he sat at the couch with an unusually large grin on his face as he slipped his bare feet into his ratty sneakers.

As his foot quickly approached the opening of the damp, old sneaker, the smell of soap quickly disappeared along with any remaining light. The odor of unwashed boy feet was baked into Connors shoes from all the sunny days spent outside sockless with them. While you were falling for your brothers feet, you weren't quite sure you were ready to be a part of the grime under his little toe nail. You had to find a way out.

You decide to try and make Connor as uncomfortable as possible, in hopes that he'll have no choice but to pull you back out. You begin by trying scratch at the edges of Connors nail bed, though your efforts are fruitless due to the fact that Connors feet had already started sweating. You begin trying to bite, taking in the vile taste of the boys' salty foot perspiration. This too is in vain as you are barely larger than a layer of his skin. Finally, you decide to try wedging yourself so far beneath his toenail that it would hopefully break skin. Gaining momentum, you run at full force right into the skin that consists of where foot meets nail. Once again, it is a wasted effort as all you manage to do is bang your head against the wall of flesh so hard that you lose consiousness.

Connor meanwhile, was walking around the house, getting ready to start his day. He had already regrown all the pedicure equipment and placed it all back neatly in his parents' room. Normally, he wouldn't be so quick to clean up after himself, but he wanted to ensure his brother down at his feet was getting the best possible experience. After all those years of torment and humiliation, he was finally the bigger brother! Walking over to the kitchen, he decides to have a bowl of oatmeal before getting on with his day, which consisted of...
1313211111112132112.title: Crud

choices: Use your cell phone to call Connor
13132111111121321123.content:
Walking over to the kitchen, Connor decides to have a bowl of oatmeal before getting on with his day, which consisted of being a lazy day of home. Connor's plan was to enjoy a normal day at home, while having his micro brother hang out with his feet for the entire day. He had no idea that you were currently unconscious underneath his toenail as he propped his feet up on the couch to watch some TV.

Meanwhile, a few minutes later, you started to wake up after your collision with Connor's foot trying to get his attention. It was pitch black when you opened your eyes and you were wondering where you were exactly. That's when you remembered you had your cell phone in your pocket. You turned on the flashlight it had and looked around. You were still underneath Connor's big toenail, so you decided you should get out of there.

You could tell as you climbed out of the nail canyon that all of your work from earlier was starting to go away. The smell of lavender soap on Connor's feet was all but gone now, replaced with the terrible stench of Connor's shoes. You shined your flashlight onto the gap between Connor's big and second toes. You saw lint, dirt and sweat begin to build, forming more and more gunk that you'd probably have to clean up later.

You eventually made it to the top of Connor's big toe and shined your flashlight down onto the rest of Connor's foot. You couldn't believe how big it was. It seemed to stretch on for a long time, you couldn't really tell where his heel was. You looked back down underneath Connor's toenail, you sighed as you saw more gunk build up underneath there as well. Why would Connor do this to you? You just spent all that time giving him a pedicure and cleaning all the gunk off his foot. Now, you got to see it all build back up. As you sat on top of the toe, you noticed that Connor having his on shoe wasn't giving you much air, at least fresh air. You felt like you were going to suffocate sitting here on Connor's foot, trapped in his shoe. You knew that you had to do something to get out of this situation.

What did you decide to do?
13132111111121321123.title: Lazy day at home

choices: You should stay there a little longer.
He should pull you out for more fun.
He should pull you out so you guys can both chill a little.
131321111111213211233.content:
You decide to pull out your phone in order to plea with your much larger brother. As you light up the screen of your smartphone, your slight glimmer of hope quickly turns to despair. Connors' gigantic shoe is blocking out all reception. "Fuck" is all you can think to yourself as you try to weigh out your other options.

Looking behind you, you decide to try to go up the top of his foot. You begin your trek across the long, barren toenail. While at normal size it may have seemed like even ground, in reality it was anything but. The ridges that formed on the surface of the nail were like little hills at your size. While they weren't too hard to climb, they certainly made the walk a little more difficult to endure. Finally, roughly 20 minutes later yo make it to the base of the nail. You latch yourself up onto the top of the toe and begin your trek.

Walking along the toe of your younger brother was a surreal experience. To the naked eye, you wouldn't have been able to tell that Connor had teeny hairs sprouting on the top of his foot, but at your size, they were roughly half of you, maybe a little bigger! Not to mention the odor that came along with it... The closer you would get to the gap between his big and second toe, the more potent the odor would become! It had the scent of a really ripe aged cheese, except not as yummy. You could see pieces of crud larger than you beginning to form at the base of the gaps. Despite how discouraging it all was, you knew you had to get out of there so you kept walking.

As you begin walking across the top of the young giants' rancid foot, you see the start of another issue. Being a natural-born athlete, Connor had a relatively high arch on his foot, and he was beginning to sweat... profusely. Having barely reached where the little hairs were sprouting on the top of his foot, a thick layer of sweat begins to develop at about ankle height to you. Even worse, the arch of his foot is ready to bring it all down hill.

You try your hardest to make it to the top, but the current overpowers your minute form. You are dragged all the way back down in a pool of vile foot sweat. Unfortunately for you, that isn't the worst part. As the salty, thick liquid slowly permeates into every crevice of your body, you fail to realize that this river of sweat is heading right between your brothers' colossal toes. You are pulled along all the way through, landing in puddle of foot juice under the soft sole of the monolithic appendage.

Suddenly, the entire shoe shakes as it seems Connor is placing his foot sideways. He must be putting his foot on his knee! Before you have time to even curse him, you are dragged along with the current to the heel of his foot. Thankfully you were a pretty talented swimmer as you managed to swim over to safety. Finding a surface to cling to, you are slightly appalled to find refuge in a mound of foot gunk stuck to the base of Connors' heel. While he was lost in his train for thought, the hot summer air quickly crept up on Connor, and he began sweating profusely. Under the expansive toenail of a young boy, John was happily munching on his brothers toe jam. Connor arrived to his friends house rather uneventfully, bar the fact that his brother is a speck of dust under his vile toenail of course! I JUST BOUGHT THE MOST AWESOME THING ONLINE! YOU'RE NEVER GONNA BELIEVE IT!" Josh cried out, clearly excited. Josh's brother Jacob was always a dick. He would constantly pick on his younger brother and break his stuff. Unlike John, who was just a little neglectful of his brother, Jacob was flat out mean. He would even go as far as to tell anyone of josh's friends embarrassing lies just to make sure he would get picked on. At 6'5, and 260 pounds of pure muscle, Jacob was a star quaterback for his football team, and his feet sure got a lot of use. So when they were sitting on the couch yesterday, and Josh kept putting his feet into his lap, he just assumed the little dweeb was looking for a beating, and quickly got up to oblige. You always make sure to embarrass me, you beat me up, and you make me smell your dirty feet! I'm tired of always being treated like shit and I'm tired of you always being in charge! You always make me feel like a stupid, worthless bug or something! Now I'm gonna return the favor. For the next week, I'm in charge! I'm the one embarrassing you, and your the one smelling my feet! Got it? If you don't obey, I can always make you smaller!" Josh boomed down, adding more pressure onto his right foot, making sure the message is clear. I'm actually a little jealous of Jacob right now. I want to worship your toes right now." Connor couldn't believe what he was hearing, he didn't think that anyone would actually enjoy being on his feet. Especially due to how gross they were. Connor told you, "Well, as soon as Jacob is done with cleaning the gunk in between my toes we can head home and leave Jacob with Josh." You said that would work.

You then asked Connor, "What did you have in mind when we got home?" Connor said...

Connor asked, wanting to make sure you were as at ease as possible down between his toes.

"There is no place I'd rather spend it little bro!" As soon as you reply to your godly younger brother, you spot Jacob in front of you trying to make a run for it. You quickly place the phone in the front pocket of your shirt and begin to make chase. You can hear Connors voice coming from both the phone and high above "John? What's going on down there?" Unable to reply, you sprint towards the mite sized quarterback and prepare to tackle him into submission. Despite Jacob being in extremely good shape, his current size made him no match for your speed. You leap forward and tackle him right into a mound of toe crud nearly twice your size.

Landing in the sludgy gunk, Jacob quickly begins becoming absorbed into the mountain of dirt and lint as if it were quicksand. He begins to cry like a young schoolboy and hollers out for mercy. Though you felt like leaving him to his fate, you didn't feel like having to dig him out afterwards so you quickly grabbed his wrist and made sure he didn't go in any further.

"Well, look at that! I don't think your god's feet are very happy with you!" You taunt Jacob, who is staring up at you with tear filled eyes.

"PLEASE! *SOB* DON'T LET ME GET STUCK HERE! *SOB* I PROMISE! I'LL DO WHATEVER YOU GUYS ASK! JUST DON'T LET ME FALL IN THERE!" You've never seen Jacob so distraught before. You couldn't help but be proud that your own younger brother broke the pride of one of the biggest douche bags you have ever came into contact with. With a hearty laugh you easily pull the minute jock from the mound that is actually just some dead skin and dirt.

"Now that you see how dangerous this spot can be, I hope you won't try to do anything stupid again, right?" You asked Jacob, who was still on his knees trembling before you.

"N-N-No sir! I promise to be obedient! Please don't punish me!" Jacob pleads, fearing the punishment for his treason.

"Sorry Jacob, there has to be consequences. Have to make sure you learn your place!" You tell Jacob, before pulling your phone out to resume your conversation with your brother.

Not wanting to deprive you of the experience, but also not wanting to put you in harms way, Connor warns you the nature of the task you would partake in. "If you really want to, I won't stop you. But I will warn you, being my insole in my worn out shoes is a lot different from being a microscopic germ between my toes. I'm not sure if you would find it as pleasant!"

"I'm sure, if it gets too much I'll just beat on your foot!" You reassure your brother, who reluctantly agrees.

You hang up the phone and look at the cowering jock before you. "You hear that? You may be getting some of your size back after all! Don't worry though, you'll still be under a foot!" You tease the little weasel, laughing at your bad pun before that familiar stomach pain returns. As the world around you two expands, you begin to be able to make things out more clearly. At around two inches tall your growth stops, while Jacobs continues a little longer in order to catch up to your size. Before you could even react to your new size, you hear you brothers dominating voice up above barking at Josh. "Josh, go grab my shoes by the door!" Connor snaps at Josh, who kinda liked this dominant side of his friend. Josh promptly does as he is told as Connor toys with his tiny pets between his rank toes. Every time Connor grabs and drops you with his giant, young toes, you forcibly get a mouth full of dead skin and sweat. Though it didn't faze you so much, you could see that Jacob wasn't having such a good time.

Before Josh could do that however, Connor makes sure to grab you guys between his rank toes. You were in between the big and second toe on his left foot, while Jacob was on the right. Josh reached for the two tiny pets, making sure to floss out as much crud as possible between his friends godly toes.

You look ahead of you and see the giant, not-exactly-clean hand of a twelve year old boy fish you out from in between your toe-haven and drop you down on a soft, spongy surface, the insole of your brothers shoe! You don't have long to get comfortable as outside the shoe, your brothers equally giant friend places the Vans slip-on onto your brothers enormous foot. He didn't even have to be told. Your brother was becoming such an imposing presence that even people his size were giving into his every whim. With a huge grin on his face, Connor hopped off the sofa and made sure to land on his feet with great impact. Feeling the two bug men squash under his grimy soles, he grew them both until he could feel their bodies sloshing around under his entire foot.

"Well, time to go enjoy another summer day! what should two young gods like us do today?" Connor asked his trusty sidekick, who replied that they should...

13132111113121312111222132.content:
The two godly boys up above decide a game of soccer sounds like fun on a hot, summer day. Calling up some neighborhood kids, they manage to get their friends Jimmy, Bobby and Caleb to join them. They quickly head to the front door and head down the street, ready to meet their friends.

*Jacobs POV*

As the entire body weight of the behemoth twelve year old boy bore down upon you, you couldn't help but curse any bad life decisions that may have put you here. You attempts in vain to cry out for mercy but with all the compression your tiny face has went through, you are unable to produce any noise. Unfortunately, there was still enough of a gap to allow the vile liquid being produced by the bucket to find its way into your tortured mouth. Unable to produce enough force to spit it back out, you are forced to swallow it, gallon after gallon. As the salty liquid forces its way into your digestive tract, you also realize that your nose somehow wasn't crushed either, and it also had the misfortune of being lined up perfectly between the plump, moist toes of your teen master. Drowning in footsweat and your own tears of humiliation, you have no choice but to endure whatever sadistic torture these mischievous boys have planned for you.

*Johns POV*
In stark contrast to the events transpiring in the right checkered Vans , you were having a blast under your brothers monolithic sole! Your mouth was not crushed beyond use unlike Jacob in the other shoe, and your toungue was far from inactive. You found yourself being unable to contain your love for your brothers godly feet, and were devoted to making sure that love was acknowledged. You planted tender kisses on the malodourous flesh wherever the little space under the massive sole allowed. You willingly swallowed all the sweat that your brother produced and ate every piece of lint that your tiny head could reach. You were a man devoted to your mission, and you could gladly spend your whole life under these feet. Your brother curled his enormous toes over your tiny body, making sure to acknowledge your effort to keep his warm sole cool.

The boys arrived at the park and met up with their friends and informed them of the other group at the field already.

"Aww man! They're older too! They'll make sure to embarrass us if we lose against them!" Josh complained, knowing how cruel the older kids can be sometimes.

"Relax! They only look about 14 and they have one less player than us! We should be okay!" Connor said reassuredly, confident in his teams ability. Connor approached the group of fourteen year olds and challenged them to a match.

"HA! VERSUS YOU SCRAWNY KIDS? This'll be the easiest game I've ever played!" Said the apparent leader of the group. Connor had never seen these boys before so he figured they must be from the next neighborhood over. With two living insoles under his feet, some would argue Connor may have been a little cockier than ever before and, as such, he took on the older boys challenge right away.

"Alright! You're on!" Connor cried out, certain that his one player advantage would help him win the match.

"Alright, lets get this ass- kicking started!" The older boy teased his much smaller adversaries before assuming his position on the field.

With his two insoles under his feet, Connor was sure that this match would turn out in his favor. Conversely, even if it didn't, it sure was a good way to punish Jacob for his infidelities to his master. As for your brother, while you did feel bad for keeping him there, you were beginning to come to terms with the fact that it was his decision to be there and you can't afford to go lightly on him and risk losing this match. If he was having second thoughts about being under his foot, he would just have to wait until after!

As the match kicked off, Jacob was beginning to wish that he wasn't pliable right now so he could just pop and end his suffering. Unfortunately, his fate was to be smothered beyond recognition by the overly-potent foot currently in control of his entire being. With every step the boy took, Jacob conformed more and more to the boys sole, sorta becoming like a fitted sole from an orthopedist. His tiny head even became like Connors personal odor eater, just large enough to eat up any grime and dead skin that his godly feet produced while he was playing in the summer sun. If he ever went back to his normal size again, he would make sure to get some of this lotion for himself and stomp his brother and his nerdy friends out of existence. For now though, nothing to do but keep hotboxing himself to death with foot-stink.

Under the left foot, you were in your own personal utopia. You wish you could take a video down here to show Connor afterwards but unfortunately your phone was in your short pockets which have essentially liquefied and infused with the pool of sweat at the base of Connors heel. Being unable to move your head much, most of your attention has been devoted to the only spot you could comfortably reach. While the rest of Connors foot may have been coated in dirt and dead skin, you were certain that the space between his second and third toe was absolutely spotless. You have been lapping away at the toe space like an obedient little puppy to the point where you felt as though your tongue was going to fall off, yet you found yourself unable to stop. You wanted to be sure that your younger brother felt like the god he was. You kept lapping away, keeping the area polished up until the point where Connor must have kicked the ball with his left foot. The impact of his immense foot hitting the gigantic ball outside effectively turned your upper body into mush as well, turning into the toe jam you were trying so desperately to clean. With not much else to do now that your face as been crushed too, you just close your eyes and enjoy your surroundings.

Up above, Connor was running around the field like crazy, working up a real sweat. With the points being at 1-1, it was a really close match. Both teams were looking for the opening to get the tie-breaker point, but it wouldn't come until a member of the opposing team accidently lets the ball slip right by Connor. Despite the fact that he would have to make the kick with his left foot, he realizes that it may be the only chance for his team and so he takes advantage and goes for the shot. To his surprise, he scores! The leader boy from before immediately screams out "BULLSHIT! HOW DID WE LOSE TO A BUNCH OF LITTLE KIDS! YOU GUYS ARE ALL WORTHLESS!" before storming off, the others packing up their things and following him soon after. The boys do the same, and all head to their respective houses, with Connor and Josh heading back to Josh's.

It's around 8 p.m. when the boys finally arrive back at Josh's place. Connor wastes no time walking over to the couch and extending his long, well-defined legs out in front of him, with a huge grin on his face. Without needing to be told, Connor immediately heads over to his friends tired feet and begins to remove them from his worn out shoes. As the feet are exposed from their confinements, the room immediately filled with the stench of cheesy boy feet.

"They smell so bad from here, I can't even imagine what those two went through!" Josh said, as he peeled the two insoles from the godly foot, no thicker than a cardboard box. They didn't even look human anymore, more like two giant wads of bubblegum. John couldn't even make out any defining features of clothes or anything, as they both melted into a uniform blob of peach colored insole.

Josh placed them on the floor to regain their shape as the two boys decided what to do now...

The mucus traps you in its slimy grip, rendering you completely helpless as the gust of wind immediately afterwards sends you flying into the water down below. You try screaming out for Connors help, but find the layer of snot coating your face makes it impossible to yell. Meanwhile however, Connor still has his head tilted back, not even aware he lost you. Connor remains blissfully unaware as you land in the water right before his crotch.

Thankfully for you, the impact of hitting the water at such a high speed effectively removed most of the mucus preventing your movement, and you were always a pretty good swimmer, so you begin to swim back over to your brothers chest. As you finally place your feet on the abdominal landmass, it is swept away from below you as Connor moves around without warning.

"JOHN!" Connor screams out. "WHERE ARE YOU!?!?" Connor begins panicking, and rightfully so. Unbeknownst to him, his erratic movements have caused you to fall back into the water, unable to get back to the surface. You trash around violently, trying to find a piece of land before the current pulls you under. Thankfully, your prayers are answered as you manage to get a grip on Connors enormous body. Holding on to the fleshy landmass, you pull yourself up and wipe the soap from your eyes. Gathering your senses, you look around as your blood runs cold. "CONNORRRR!!!!!!" You scream out in shill horror, as the musky scent of his unwashed manhood permeates all your senses.

Unfortunately for you, Connor was still calling out your name, and his voice far overpowered yours. Still unable to locate you among the vast seat of bubbles that was actually just his bath, Connor decides to stand up, looking for you. Despite your best efforts to keep your grip on your brothers fleshy package, gravity simply isn't on your side. As your brother extends to his full height, the soap and water make it extremely difficult to hold on, and you fall to the water down below, landing right between Connors legs.

The fall was absolutely horrifying. You were in air for about 5 seconds before landing into the lake down below. Up above, you can see your brother frantically displacing the sea of bubbles around you, frantically searching for you with a look of genuine concern on his face. He almost found you a few times too, but unfortunately the current ensured you went under before he had a chance to see you. Thankfully for you, the shrinking made you practically indestructible, or else you may have drowned like 4 times already.

After about a minute, Connor realizes that his efforts are fruitless, and he calls out "John! If you can hear me, get to your boat! I'll look there in a minute!" Not wanting to take any chances, you desperately begin your swim over the the boat, which was scaled for someone twice your size. Swimming as fast as your little body could take you, you're close enough to touch the boat, when suddenly you hear a loud rushing sound behind you.

*WHOOSH*

Was all you heard as the massive tidal wave caused by your brother sitting down consumed you and pulled you back underwater. To add to your misfortunes, you were pulled backwards as Connors massive body displaced most of the water in the tub. Sadly, it didn't stop there, as when you looked up, you realized you were in the direct path of your brothers gargantuan testicles! In the moments that followed, you were completely powerless as the enormous flesh sack overtook your entire body and held you at the bottom of the tub under its mass. Without a better plan, you close your eyes and cringe as you bite down on the hairless skin with all of your might, trying not to recoil in disgust as your mouth fills with the taste of sweaty balls, watered down with soap.

Thankfully, your plan worked. "YOWZA!!" Connor screamed in pain before sending his left hand to investigate the pinch. Humiliated beyond belief by your younger brothers manhood, you lay limp in defeat as Connors hand grabs you and brings you up to his face.

"JOHN! HOLY CRAP! ARE YOU OKAY?!" Conner cries out frantically as you just sit in his palm, unable to look him in the eye.

"Connor, can you just get me out of here.... I don't wanna do this anymore..." you say weakly, keeping your head down in shame.

"Uh, sure... where sho-----"

" I don't care, just out of here... finish your bath without me..." you interrupt your brother, not being very considering of your brothers feelings.

"*sniffle* O-Okay" Connor says as he grabs your tiny frame in his hands and brings you over to the medicine cabinet, holding back his waterworks. He didn't dare ask you what happened or how you ended up under his crotch for fear of you yelling at him. He placed you inside with some toilet paper to dry yourself off and went to complete his bath on his own.

When Connor finished his bath, he got dressed into his pyjamas and picked you out from the cabinet. Not a word was exchanged between you to as he walked over to his bedroom, you in tow. When he got to his room, he placed you down on the floor before his feet as he sat on the bed, when he finally broke the silence.

In tears, Connor explained "I'm really sorry about all that John *sniffle* If you want, I'll just make you normal size again! We never have to talk about this again, or anything! I'll throw all the lotion out! Just please! Don't go back to being mean to me again!" Connor is choking on his sobs for how terrible he feels, and it breaks your heart. In tears as well, you run over to his big toe and begin hugging and caressing it, hoping to calm him down.

"Hey big guy" you say between sobs "Don't worry about me! I'm fine! I survived! Besides, it was my idea to come with you anyways! Why don't you just get some sleep! You must be tired! I'll sleep with you again tonight!" You say hoping to cheer him up.

In shock you glanced over at Connor, who was driving like an expert, and noticed his face has also changed. Gone was the childlike roundness and traces of baby fat; Connor’s face was all sharp angles, making him strikingly, brutally handsome. He looked like a twenty year-old pro football player, not a mere twelve year-old boy!

After about ten minutes he pulled his flashy sports car into a space in front of Gold’s Gym and shut it off. Then he turned toward you and you flinched back in fear. Connor smirked as he loomed menacingly far above you, the top of your head barely reaching the base of his sculpted, phenomenal pecs.

“I warned you not to piss me off, runt, and you still talked back to me,” Connor rumbled. “Mom and Dad gave me complete authority to punish you however I saw fit, for whatever I wanted, no questions asked. You’ve already earned yourself a whole week of Hell, so when we go inside, you’d better sit down, shut up and wait for me to finish my work-out. Got it?”

You wanted to ask him when Mom and Dad had put him in charge, much less gave him total dominion over you. You wanted to find out how he had learned to drive, learn where he had gotten this new car and its keys, and question whether he realized he’s grown several years older and about four times bigger than he was this morning! With your cheek still painfully aching, however, you didn’t dare say anything except, “Yes, Connor”. Your voice cracked and went up to a higher register at those words, something it hadn’t done for the prior three years.

“Yes’, what?” Connor prompted you threateningly, his defined, enormous muscles rippling and bulging. You nearly panicked as you thought desperately about what to say before it finally came to you.

“Yes, sir,” you replied respectfully, still piping in that higher, younger voice, quite a contrast to Connor’s imposingly commanding baritone.

The two of you exited the car, Connor locking the doors with his key fob before assertively swaggering into the building ahead of you. You trailed behind him, seeking to marshal and organize your thoughts. You’re starting to question your very sanity. Have you actually gone crazy? Or was it really just yesterday that you were sixteen years-old, six foot two in height and had been tasked with watching your twelve year-old, annoying little brother Connor for the week while your parents were away? Now everything was different, and you didn’t know if reality itself had gone mad, or if YOU had!

Two senior varsity football players, Derrick Thompson and Shawn Morgan, who were working the bench-press, walked over as soon as the two you came in.

“Hey, Connor, great to see you!” Derrick opened enthusiastically. Derrick always seemed cool and laid-back at school, but he was visibly excited to see Connor. Shawn, too, suddenly acted more like a kid on Christmas morning instead of a popular senior jock.

“Looking fantastic as usual!” he complimented Connor.

Flattery that might have been, but it was also true. Little Connor had become a towering, incredibly built teenage Hercules! It was obvious Derrick and Shawn genuinely looked up to your brother, both figuratively and literally.

Wait a minute; Derrick was six foot three! For him to be looking up to Connor that way meant your brother had to be about six foot six now! You bit back a groan at the thought that you barely reached up to your great Goliath sibling’s eight-pack, iron abs!

Connor exchanged confident high fives with both boys and you saw them try to subtly shake their hands out afterward.

“I hope you two are keeping fit for the fall,” he said and they eagerly assured him they had been, Shawn calling him “Captain”.

“Captain?” you accidentally asked aloud, and Derrick and Shawn turned their attention to you for the first time.

“Yeah, Connor’s the first sophomore captain of the Varsity football team in our school’s history!” Shawn boasted. “Didn’t you know that?”

“So who’s this?” Derrick wanted to know.

“This is John, my worthless pest of younger sibling,” Connor told them contemptuously. Immediately Derrick and Shawn’s gazes turned hard and hostile toward you.

“Sit over there and don’t move or say a word until I’m ready to go,” Connor ordered imperiously, pointing to the nearest corner.
You complied and experienced an odd sense of rightness at instantly obeying your now-colossally BIG brother. It also seemed somehow natural for Connor to be an adolescent He-Man alpha male.

You watched in open-mouthed shock as Connor proudly showed off how monumentally, immensely strong he was, bench-pressing well over a thousand pounds, curling three-fifty with each arm, and leg-pressing a literal ton. For the entire two hours of his strenuous work-out you didn’t speak a single word, struggling to take in the fact that at now-sixteen years-old, Connor was already one of the buffest, strongest men on the entire planet!

After his shower Connor stalked over to you, the stunning adolescent Greek god’s massive, rippling muscles pumped up with blood and power.

“Let’s go, wuss,” he told you and seized your arm, so thin and weak next to his. Tears once more gathered in your eyes at the blinding pain of giant Connor’s crushing grip. Your brother was such a titanic powerhouse he could’ve literally ripped your entire arm off without any effort if he’d wanted!

Connor dragged you to the Porsche and practically threw you inside before driving home. He cooked dinner while you consoled yourself with the thought that nothing seems to have changed since you and Connor went to Gold’s gym. Maybe these inexplicable, insane changes to reality have stopped?

Even if they have, however, it’s too late for you; your entire life has already been upended! You’ve shrunk back down to a four foot six shrimp of a twelve year-old, while the new, superlative Connor was a sixteen year-old, six foot six tower of unstoppable, pure physical power and uber-ripped, rock-hard muscle!

“Clean up the table, midget,” your gorgeous, flawless Hulk of a brother ordered you dismissively. Not even able to dream of disobeying the terrifyingly enlarged, awesomely empowered Connor at this point, you quickly did your ultimate fraternal authority figure’s unquestionable will.
14121321.title: The gym and then home with the new, Adonis Connor!

choices: You wake up in bed, everything is normal
You wake up in bed, nothing is normal
You don't wake up; this isn't a dream!
14121322.content:
Your face burned red with humiliation as Connor strode down the sidewalk , carrying you over his broad right shoulder, like a helpless little kid.

Which is exactly what you felt like. You'd shrunk down to four foot six, the height you were in elementary school. Connor, by contrast, has somehow grown to your old height of six foot two, though he boasted a hell of a lot more muscle mass than you did! From your captive position, with his large, iron-muscled right arm holding you in place, you could see Connor's tensed bicep was bigger than your HEAD!

How could all of this be happening?!?! It was like some kind of crazy nightmare!

Wait a minute, maybe that's exactly what this was: a nightmare, a bad dream! That would explain everything, including how reality itself has kept shifting and changing. Yeah, a bad dream, driven by subconscious guilt over how you'd treated Connor lately. It made so much sense! In fact, it was the only thing that made sense.

If you're right, all you have to do is pinch yourself and that should wake you up. You hesitate for a second, take a deep breath, and then pinch your left forearm hard.
14121322.title: A nightmare, or not?

choices: Your delusion fails and you remember the truth
No!  Things ARE way different today!
Connor punches you and nearly breaks your jaw
141213223.content:
Owww! You look up hopefully, but your hope dies when you realized nothing had changed. You are still pinned over Connor’s shoulder like an infant. And worse, Connor is entering the park! No! Your friends hang out here a lot, and the last thing you want is for any of them to see you like this!

You pray frantically that no one you know will be here.

“Hey, Connor!” a familiar voice shouts out.

So much for your prayers.

“Hey, T.J., Keith,” Connor calls back to two of your closest friends. You try to twist around to see them, but
Connor’s grip is inescapable and his heavily-muscled, curled arm and head completely block your view.

“What’s up, big man?” T.J. asks happily.

Why were they addressing only Connor? They must not recognize you. They can’t see your face, just as you can’t see theirs. Maybe, with a little luck, you will escape with your pride intact.

“Not much, just having to cart this shrimp to and from his doctor’s appointment,” Connor responds disgustedly. Then he roughly sets you down on your feet, your eyes now level with Connor’s killer, six-pack abs, their outline clearly visible through your hulking younger brother’s skin-tight black T-shirt. You shrink back away, genuinely intimidated by his imposing stature.

You then glance up in embarrassment to see T.J. and Keith both looming over you, scowling.

“He sure doesn’t look like he’s grown any,” Keith snorts.

“He hasn’t. Even the testosterone booster shots haven’t helped.”

A chill goes through you at his words. So even with extra testosterone, you still aren’t growing now?

“Too bad for him he doesn’t take after his BIG “little” brother,” T.J. jokes.

“In his dreams!” Connor says scornfully.

“So you up for a basketball game or two?” Keith invites Connor.

Wait a minute, you can understand why your buddies aren’t surprised by Connor’s shocking size; the doctor acted as if your kid bro had always been a very buff preteen titan. Why, though, are T.J. and Keith treating Connor like an equal, while ignoring you?

“Hey, what about me?” you ask, your voice high-pitched.

“What ABOUT you?” T.J. shoots back.

“You’re too tiny to play with the big kids, runt,” Connor sneers condescendingly. “Go hang out on the swings or the monkey bars until I’m ready to go.”

Placing a hand on your shoulder, your extremely enlarged, awesomely empowered younger sibling shoves you in the direction of the children’s section of the park. Unfortunately, Connor is so big and so strong now that even his light, casual push sends you sprawling headlong onto the grass.

All three of them laugh at you, and something inside you snaps. You jump to your feet, and shout at T.J.,
Keith, “What’s wrong with you two? You guys are supposed to be my friends!”

“Why? Just because we’re in the same grade?” T.J. scoffs. “We’ve got nothing in common, and Keith and I’ve never hung out with you, only with Connor.”

“Wait, so you’re hanging out with a seventh grader?” you ask incredulously. In high school, choosing to pal around with kids is considered pretty humiliating.

“With a seventh grade Goliath as cool as Connor? Hell, yes!” Keith answers unashamedly.

“Come on, guys, the wuss has wasted enough of our time,” Connor declares. He deliberately walks right into you, knocking you down again, as he, T.J. and Keith head over to the basketball court.

Though you’re in a bit of physical pain, you’re in greater emotional pain. It’s your onetime friends’ rejection which stings the most. After all, you’re pretty used to being called derisive, belittling names by your much larger “little” brother.

Wait a minute, no, you’re not! Up until now it you who called Connor insulting names, and you’ve always been taller than him! Why would you think otherwise? Is even your own mind turning against you?!?!

Afraid and uncertain, you spend the next hour watching as your uber-athletic preteen sibling takes both T.J. and Keith on at once, beating them handily in all three games. After the first game Connor strips off his shirt, showing off his statuesque, immensely muscled upper body, much to the appreciation of the group of teenage girls also watching the games.

You realize, to your shock, that Connor is the dominant alpha male, the undisputed leader of the trio, in spite of being four years younger than either T.J. or Keith.

The point is underlined when Connor comes striding back toward you, his shirt back on, and the two sixteen year-olds following subserviently behind him.

“Okay, shrimp, time to head home. Do a good job on dinner and maybe I’ll forget what an annoying little shit you’ve been today,” Connor tells you commandingly.

“Later, guys!” Connor says, waving good-bye to T.J. and Keith as the two of you leave the park.
You trudge toward home and Connor, with his considerably longer legs, quickly outdistances you. He’s nearly out of sight before he turns back around and comes to stop a few feet in front of you.

“Pick up the pace, midget! Move those little legs or I’ll have to carry you again.”

You thought you’d grown numb to this bizarre living hell, but this latest arrogant order sets you off. Whirling around you shout up at Connor, “This is impossible! You’re only twelve years old! There’s no way you can be anywhere near this size!”

“What is it with you and denying reality today?” he asks in irritation. “Of course I’m way taller and better-built than anyone else my age! What do you expect, with my awesome bod producing so much more testosterone and growth hormones than normal? Naturally I grew huge, just like you’re a shrimp because your body barely produces any hormones at all! After having such a worthless dud for a first son, I bet Mom and Dad were grateful to get such a total stud for their second son! Now get moving, or I’ll beat your puny ass right here!” Connor concludes threateningly.

In an instant your mind flashes back to the many times in the past you’ve cowered helplessly before an angry, colossal Connor, who then uses his terrible strength to painfully physically punish you.

There it is again! More memories appearing in your mind which never actually happened! What is going on here?!? Are you going mad?

Or . . . are you finally regaining your sanity?

Is everything really changing around you, inexplicably and without warning? Perhaps, instead, the delusion which you sought refuge in, the one you used to hide from the fact that your younger brother is a mighty giant for his age and you're a midget for yours, is breaking down?
141213223.title: You don't wake up; this isn't a dream!
