You made countless futile attempts to stand up as his bulk was too much for you to carry. Then, through panted breaths, told him, "You happy now? Told you it's impossible." He simply grinned and said, "Haha! I knew I was big but I didn't know I was THAT big!" You continued to take deep breaths to recover from trying to carry that boy.

Suddenly, you hear a loud rumbling sound, it came from Connor's stomach. "Could we get something to eat big bro I'm starving!" he said with plain innocence. Now that introduced a new problem, how on earth was he going to get out of your room? You told Connor to try and exit the room, to which he replied, "Okay... I'll try but I don't think I can." He walked towards the door, and realized that his shoulders were too wide to fit through the door. He ducked down and attempted to go through sideways. He stuck his head through, followed by his shoulders and arms. He held his weight with his large hands as he slowly inched his body out of the miniature doorway. You watch in awe as you see his torso, then his long legs and finally his large feet leave the room as he gingerly crawled out. He stood back up to his normal height and again, was hunched slightly with his head to the ceiling. You brought him down the stairs to the kitchen, which was difficult for Connor as his feet were hanging over each steps by quite a fair bit. Asking him to sit down while you prepared a meal, the words barely left your mouth as you hear a loud creaking sound. You turn to see your large younger brother smiling, fitting his large frame onto a small wooden chair. His butt was barely on the seat and his back was way bigger than the backrest. You see the four legs of the chair bent outwards as it struggled to hold the massive weight of your 'little' brother, threatening to break if he were to grow again. You sigh in desperation and just found whatever you could in the fridge to hopefully satiate your brother's humongous appetite.

Displayed on the table were plates of different foods. A pot of soup, a mountain of chicken nuggets, a large pizza and assorted fruits, coupled with two 2 gallon jugs of milk. Unable to resist the spread of food in front of him, he dug in, shoving the food handful by handfuls. It took him 30 minutes to clear the table entirely off all of it. He burped loudly, and, forgetting that he was sitting on a small chair, leaned back, the puny wooden backrest unable to support his weight and was absolutely demolished. Just as you were to say something, you heard cracking noises, followed by a snap and a huge THUD! as the chair legs finally gave way, snapping as they were unable to hold Connor's monstrous weight. His fall caused the 2 jugs of milk on the table, among other things, to topple over, as well as slightly cracking the floor tiles. He simply stood up with a wide grin and laughed it off, saying "Oops! Chairs nowadays are being made of cheap materials now huh John?" He still had the same height as when you were in the room as you were still navel height to him. You shake your head at him, and just sat back down on your chair.

Connor then said, "Big bro... can we please...
143212112.title: 9 feet tall

choices: Connor wanted you to rub his feet
Connor wanted to play a game
1432121122.content:
... do something together?"

Then, Connor started to grow again. He was already on the floor, with the remains of the wooden chair below him. His arms and legs expanded, packing on muscle and lengthening across the floor. His hands and feet also grew wider and longer, allowing him to grasp more things and to support his growing weight. His torso became more defined, with his chest becoming more defined. You could make out a slight 6 pack at his stomach. The wood below him was slowly but surely ground into sawdust

Seeing this again, you were curious as to his size now and asked him, "Fine. But I want to do something first. I wanna measure how big you are and how much you weigh." Though he initially protested, Connor then decided to do only if he could compare sizes with you, as he wanted to see how you measured up to him.

You both went to the bathroom. The ceilings of the bathroom were about 14 feet, god knows why your parents made it that way, but it was probably so that they could have the rain shower set inside. The bathroom was large, being able to accommodate both you and Connor with much room to spare. "Ahhhh... Finally. Hunching down really damages to your posture you know?" Connor exclaimed, finally being able to stretch to his full size without being restrained by the ceilings. You could see that there was still a distance between the ceiling and Connor's hair. Both you and Connor then walked to beside the bathtub and sat down.

"Firstly, let us compare hand sizes!" Connor exclaimed. You placed your palms up against his, and was shocked to see that his palms have definitely grown since you compared them back when he was still 7'8. Your palm sat in the middle of his. You see that the ends of your fingers were still inches away from where his fingers started. "So tiny! Feet next!" Connor said with fascination.

You dreaded this, as you already know that when he was normal, he had overly sized feet, paired with long toes to match. You placed your severely smaller foot against his, heel to heel, and the difference is stark. You could see his soft bare sole on either side of your foot. Your toes only reached about half the length of his foot, no, definitely less, at about the middle of the arch of his foot. You put both of your foot on top of each other to see if you could match up to his size, but sadly, your foot's toes only reach up to the second joint of his big toe. Speaking of which, you moved closer to compare with his freakishly long toes. You put where your toes started against where his toes started, and was absolutely startled to find out that the width of his big toe alone was the length of your big toe till your third toe. Similarly as before, your toes also ended where the joint of his big toe was at, albeit slightly higher. You placed your heel against the start of his big toe, and found out that his toe was touching the ball of your foot. 2 freaking third the length of your foot! And that was only his big toe?! You thought to yourself. You then proceeded to put your foot horizontally across Connor's foot, and was shocked again, that his foot was slightly wider than your foot was long!!! What even!?

You wanted to say something, but what actually came out though was only a "What!?", which was all you could say due to the sheer enormity of his feet. Those long and slender toes, ending with bulbous and round digits at the end. The longness of his feet, the utter width of them, they vastly outsized your "minuscule" size 13 feet. You did some mental calculations and had a rough estimate of about size 56 feet, at about 29 inches long and about 13 inches wide! It was actually more than 4 times your own shoe size. Letting that number sink in, you just sat there and stoned.

"Ooooo~~ My feet are soooo much bigger than yours~!" Connor squealed with delight. You could only imagine that what Connor saw was just his own foot covering yours, occasionally feeling your small feet moving over his much larger ones. "You know, yours are so small, I didn't even see your toes clear mine once at all! I sure am a big kid~~" Connor beamed with satisfaction and pride. "Well let's carry on with the height and weight portion shall we?" He carried on with excitement.

Connor lifted you off the ground onto your feet, and once again, you're reminded of how tiny you were. You were eye level with his member, to which you can see was packed tightly within his tight boxers. You grabbed a stool, along with a measuring tape and stood on top of it. Even then, you barely reached his upper torso, his head still far from your reach. That was when Connor took the measuring tape (which had a small latch at the end to hold onto things while measuring), stepped on the latch and pulled it up. He then carried you up and passed the measuring tape to you. "Let me help you with that!" Connor said with a sheepish grin on his face. You then proceeded to pull the tape till his head, and you took note of his height, a whopping 13 feet 6 inches! You were appalled at his height, he was more than double your height! You stood there with great desperation at the utter size of your younger brother, muttering a "So tall..." underneath your breath. Connor then told you to weigh him, to which you, looking at the size that he is at now, guessed that he was waaaaaay heavier than you.

Connor pulled you over to the scale, which was definitely not made to weigh a person the size of Connor, though it could handle up to 550 pounds. It was one of those hybrid scales, with the needle as well as a rounded display at the front of the pad, covered by plastic. Standing next to it, you could see that Connor's foot could not even fit the scale. He sat down and attempted to put both of his gigantic foot onto the scale, but to no avail. The scale was only touching a small portion of each of his wide feet. Were he to actually stand on them, he would definitely topple over. He hovered one of his foot over the scale, and slowly lowered his heel onto where the pad started, which dwarfed it completely. You could see that his elongated feet were greatly longer than the length of the scale, slightly less than thrice the length of the scale. Width wise, his wide foot completely covered the scale. I then told him to put the front end of his foot, almost like a tip-toe position onto the pad, to which his long toes took up most of the pad and almost jutted out of the pad. However, this was the only way that I could get a somewhat accurate measure of his weight without his scarily long toes or freakishly lankly foot blocking the display. Then again, I honestly had no idea what would happen, could the scale even hold his massive weight? What was his weight even? I was only a 180 pounds, how much did he outweigh me by? The questions went on and on...

I snapped out of it and then told Connor, "Now I want you to slowly, SLOWLY, put more of your weight onto the scale." As he did so, I saw the needle move steadily, flying past 100, 200 and 250. As it neared 300, I looked to Connor, who still looked like he wasn't even putting half his weight on the scale yet!!! The numbers on the display kept on creeping up, moving past 325, 350 and 375 as Connor still slowly increased his weight. I was shocked, even at this weight, he had already outweighed me by twice my own!! And the scale still did not capture his full weight yet!

I observed with bated breaths as I see the number still steadily rising after so long, crawling past the 425 barrier and nearing the 500 mark. I asked Connor, "Ey! How much more till you are at your full weight!? You already outweigh me by so much!", to which he replied gleefully, "We're getting there~" I see the needle moving ever so closely to the 550 mark, and STILL! it kept on rising. When it hit 550, I told Connor to stop. I see both the digital as well as the needle at the 550 mark. It was then that I told him to increase the weight he was putting onto the scale even more slowly, to which he did. The digital scale immediately displayed an "ERR" message, signifying the massive weight of Connor, but the needle surprisingly still kept on going.

The moment the needle hit the 100 mark again, I started to hear creaking sounds, a true testament to Connor's mind-boggling heft. I asked him once more, "This is endless! How much more." "Almost~~~" This time he replied with an even bigger smile, the creaking sound gradually getting louder, and louder. I kept my eye on the needle. The moment it hit 150, Connor exclaimed, "THERE!" I was about to open my mouth to say something, but suddenly, a loud SNAP and CRACK was heard. The scale could no longer support the full and true weight of Connor, which then proceeded to cave inwards where Connor was standing. All of a sudden, you see Connor drop a few inches down, his gargantuan foot slamming down onto the floor as well as the scale. You could feel a rumble as his foot made contact with the floor. All that was left of that were some scrap plastic, pieces of metal as well as the needle from earlier. Everything else was buried underneath the hefty soles of Connor.

Looking at it, you were aghast at his unearthly weight. A simple "700" was muttered underneath your breath, as you stood there dazed. Connor just laughed, and said, "700~~ So heavy~ So big!~" Connor then went into deep thought on what to do next...
1432121122.title: do something together?"

choices: It was all a trick, Connor had other plans for you
14321211222.content:
Connor loved how huge he was. "700 pounds, 13 feet and 6 inches tall, and size 56 feet! This is incredible, I'm so much bigger than John," Connor thought to himself. He continued thinking, "It seems like I'm just going to keep getting bigger compared to John! Maybe he and I should play a game so I can assert my dominance over him!" Connor looked way down at you to see you still staring up at him in awe.

"Hey John! I think we should play a game!" Connor said this with a big grin on his face. You responded, "Alright Connor, what did you have in mind?" Connor responded, "Hmmmmmm... I was thinking we'd play a new game that I just thought of! I call it lift the foot!" You thought about that game for a moment and you could pretty much guess what the object of the game was. You said, "Alright Connor, what are the rules?" He laughed and said, "So obviously, the object of the game is that you need to lift up my gigantic foot with your tiny little hands. If you win, then I'll leave you alone... for now. However, if you lose... you'll find out your consequence later," Connor said as he burst our laughing again.

You hesitantly agreed to play Connor's game and you went somewhere in the house where he could lie down without damaging anything. You both went back into the living room where your now massive younger brother laid down and put his huge feet directly in front of you.

"You ready John?" Connor asked. You responded, "Yes, I'm ready!"

What happened next?
14321211222.title: Connor wanted to play a game

143212112221.content:
You walked over to where he was lying down, near his huge feet, admiring the vast length of them. You can see that they were maintained well, dirt free and were also smooth and had the smell of soap. Standing by it, you see that his feet were as long as your legs; his toes were at where your crotch was at. The sheer size and weight of his feet might be too much for you to handle.

"Okay Connor, I'm ready. Do you want me to lift your foot from the heel or from the sole?"
"Hm... The sole!"

He lifted his right leg, and positioned his foot directly above you, with his knee bent. With both hands raised, you put your left hand across the length of his big toe and your right across the width of his heel. Both his heel and his big toe were bigger than your hands! His big toe was longer by about 2 inches, though it was slightly thinner, and his heel could barely fit in your palms! You struggled to hold on to both parts of his foot due to the size of them, wondering as to how you were going to lift this gargantuan sized foot. Just then, Connor decided to drop his foot's weight on you. You let out a shout, followed by grunts, as your knees buckled from the sudden increase of weight. You struggled to continue lifting his foot, as your knees were on the ground already.

You were not about to suffer this humiliation of being overpowered by his foot. You gathered up all your strength and slowly got up to your knees, lifting the foot up inch by inch. All of a sudden, your right arm started to cramp up, effectively disabling it. Your remaining arm was not able to handle the weight of his foot on its own and thus gave way as well. His foot landed on your torso, being just as long as it was and pinned you on the ground. You were trapped, with no strength to push off the colossal mass on top of you. Your torso was bruised from the impact of his foot as you laid there exhausted.

"Looks like you've lost!~~ Now for your punishment! I want you to...
143212112221.title: You lost

1432121122211.content:
"Looks like you've lost! Now for your punishment! I want you to rub and lick my feet!" You heard Connor say this and your eyes moved toward his giant feet. You had to rub and lick them? That's crazy!

Connor laughed and said to you, "What are you just looking at my feet for little bro?! You better get to work before they get even bigger!" You sighed and knelt down to Connor's feet and began to rub. You were still amazed at how big they were and how small your hands were compared to them. The skin on his feet was so tough, it was almost difficult to rub. Connor said, "That feels good bro! You should lick my feet now!" You moved your head down toward Connor's feet not wanting to anger him. You licked his feet and wanted to be sick. The taste was terrible! Connor began to laugh very loud and said, "I can't believe you did it! It's like your my little slave!"

14321211222113.content:
Connor went to the couch and laid down, laughing as you were still gagging over licking his feet. After gulping down enough water to wash the taste out of your mouth, you returned, seeing his oversized body splayed out on the couch; his torso was leaning against one of the armrests, while his calves rested on the other one. The couch sagged deeply from the bulk that it was carrying, signifying Connor's weight. Were he to tackle and pin you down again like he did previously, you were definitely going to suffer more than just a few bruises.

"Oh crap, I gotta use the toilet!" Connor said, dashing up the stairs to the toilet, his long feet barely on the stairs itself with each step which also caused the stairs to creak loudly underneath him. You were sure that if he were to grow again, they would absolutely break.

[Connor's POV]

"Shit, how is this going to work?" you said as you stared at the little toilet below you. With your long legs beside the toilet, your huge member hung high above where the bowl was at. You were in a desperate need to pee. You struggled to aim it into the bowl, and with great relief, you released it all. Shaking off the excess, you tried to flush, but your huge fingers were too big to fully press it in, hence you used a toothbrush to press it.

You carefully walked down the stairs, your feet hanging off each step so much that it was already touching the next one. The last thing you wanted was for you to trip and fall. The loud creaking of the steps announced to John your arrival. As you reached the bottom, you saw something that caught your attention: yours and John's footwear. You remembered how John always liked having bigger feet than you, he always liked to wear your footwear while making you wear his. You decide to do a throw back to that just to have fun and compare feet with him one last time as the next time you grow you'll probably be too big. You put his your socks, shoes and flip flops into a box, and just as you wanted to take your size 9s, you saw your old footwear, when you were wearing size 7s instead. You decide to take that instead for a better size comparison and walked towards the living room.

[John's POV]

You saw Connor walking towards you, carrying a box to which he placed on the coffee table. "Let's have some fun shall we? Remember how you always made me wear your shoes while you wore mine? Let's relive those memories~!" Connor said. You, looking at him, happily agreed. "Bro, you go first, I wanna see you wearing these size 7s!" You first tried to wear the socks. You stretched them to a maximum, putting them over your wide feet. You pulled with great effort for them to cover the length of your feet, but the threads of them can only stretch that much. It could only cover about 2/3 of it, your heel was still exposed. You then took his shoes, untied them and stuck your feet in them. Your toes reached the end of the cramped shoes, yet there was still abbit of your heel stuck out side. You pulled harder with all your might, trying to shove your heel in when suddenly you felt the resistance disappear and tearing sounds. Your toes have broken through the front and were now poking out! Connor said with a smirk, "Hehe, luckily I can't wear those anymore~ Try the slippers now!"

You obliged and took off the ruined shoes and socks. You put his flip flop against your heel, and saw that your toes were completely jutting out of the soles, and that your feet were wider than them as well. You placed them on the floor, and squeezed your feet into them. The straps doing its best to stretch to allow your feet to go in. However, as the straps stretched to become wider, it moved down while doing so, having lesser space for the height of your feet. You had to constantly adjust and slowly move your feet in. As your big and second toe went as deep as they could with the straps, you could see that your feet was spilling out everywhere. Your heel jutting out the back, your toes hung over the edge of the slippers heavily and the sides of your feet not even being contained within the flip flop. "Ain't that a familiar sight, right bro?" Connor said jokingly. "It was my turn now!" he added.

You were quite interested by this, how was Connor even going to wear all of your stuff? You hurried him on, "Quick Connor! Wear mine now!" Connor, like you started with your socks. He tried to put it on, but his fingers were too big, so you helped him. Your socks, though they were big, could only stretch that much. You struggled, but you managed to pull them over his big and second toes. You could see that the socks were stretched to its maximum opening, the mouth of it reaching its maximum elasticity. Length wise however, there was still room, but nonetheless impressive. You then proceeded to fit your shoe onto those 2 toes, but his big toe alone was wider than the mouth of the shoe, hence, you removed the socks and tried to squeeze his toe into it. You unlaced everything and tried to shove it in, but to no avail. Once again, you forcefully shove it in, pulling the shoes, which once again resulted in them being torn, this time at the sides to accommodate the huge width of his toe. "Wow... This really puts your feet to shame don't they bro!" Connor said with a laugh. Removing the destroyed shoe, you both look to the flip flops. His big toe alone was far too big to fit through the straps of them. Hence, you placed it against his second and third toe, and you could see that there was enough space. Thus, you helped him to squeeze those 2 toes into it, shoving it in till the thong at the end were at his toe gap. However, halfway through, the supporting straps already reached his toe gaps, thus you pushed with great effort, causing those straps to break off. This allowed his feet to "wear" more of the flip flop. With the thong at his toe gap, his bulbous digits covered the front of the flip flops, while the rest of them were buried beneath the rest of his toes as well as his hefty soles. The two straps that were supposed to be secured to the flip flop were now resting on top of his foot. You couldn't see anything save for the thong in between his toes, and even then, it was hard due to his monster feet. You were surprised by what you saw today because you did not believe that he could wear anything today.

What happened next?

143212112221131.content:
Stunned at just how much bigger Connor was than you, you decided that it was time to do something else. You looked up to your massive, younger brother and said, "Hey Connor, why don't we go outside to the pool? It is such a nice day after all! Also, you'd have a lot more room to grow if you were to get bigger again." Connor smiled and said, "Good idea little bro! I am starting to feel a little cramped in here."

You go upstairs to go put your bathing suit on. You do that and go to grab one for Connor, only to realize that it would be impossible for him to fit in any bathing suit in your house. You walk back down stairs and open the door to the back yard. You look behind you and say, "Come on Connor, let's not waste this awesome day!" Connor looked at the door and realized that this was not going to be easy. Standing at 13'6 with size 56 feet, it was going to be near impossible for him to exit the house without ripping the door down. Connor crawled over to the door and tried to crawl out, but his shoulders were way to wide. He pushed and pushed, but he couldn't get out. He tried turning around, going feet first, but that didn't work either! Although he was able to get his feet out the door, his waist was way to wide too. Connor really so not other choice but to lunge at the door frame, destroying it. There was a big enough hole for him to get out of the house and he crawled out and stood up, stretching, thankful to be out of the house. You meanwhile just stood there with wondering what just happened. You looked up to Connor and said, "Why would you destroy the door Connor?" He laughed and responded, "Well I wasn't going to be able to get out of the house if I didn't do that little bro!"

Connor walked past you toward the and you followed, all of a sudden though Connor stopped moving and you ran into one of his massive legs. You looked up at him and asked, "What's wrong Connor?"

What was happening?
143212112221131.title: You both went to your backyard pool for a swim

1432121122211311.content:
Connor stood by the pool deck, his long toes curled over the edge of the pool, touching the water as they were long enough. "I don't think the pool is big enough for me to swim in bro." Your backyard pool was, large; when compared to your size. It was rectangular shaped, slightly smaller than 20' x 10' x 4.9'. The height of the water was slightly lower than the edge of the pool as there were filters at the sides, making the water roughly 4.6' deep. "Look Connor, you may not be able to swim laps inside, but you could definitely fit inside. Don't you want to see how much you occupy inside the pool? Don't let this golden opportunity slip past us!"
"Okay then! Let's go!"

You went to the pool stairs, and walked down into the warm waters, swimming about in freestyle. Connor carefully entered the pool. He didn't want to cause a huge overflow of unnecessary water out onto the backyard or to damage the pool due to his weight. He dipped his huge toes into the waters first, followed by his large size 56 feet and his legs. Reaching the bottom, the water level barely reached up to his thighs. You swam over to the middle of the pool, where he stood. "Bro, I'm gonna suggest you move away, I'm gonna try to sit down!" You went to the side of the pool, as you saw Connor try to gingerly sit down. He bent his knees, and placed both of his hands into the waters, then proceeded to lower his huge butt and the rest of his body into the pool. However, when he did this, you were floating higher and higher as more of him went into the water. The water level kept rising and rising, until eventually the drainage systems could not handle the influx and some of the pool water overflowed onto the backyard. When the water level finally settled, it was at the edge of the pool, above the filters, as Connor took up too large a space in the pool.

"This is amazing!" Connor said, "Back up bro, I wanna try laying on the pool" he added. Connor slowly laid back onto the pool surface, and took a deep breath, floating on top of the water. You swam over to him and climbed up his torso, lying at where his chest was. You could feel the unevenness of the 'ground' below you as he had slightly developed abs. "You know, this actually feels sooo nice and relaxing, doesn't it?" You asked Connor. "I don't know bro, I'm not lying comfortably on top of somebody now. Maybe if I had someone to lie on I could relate." You could feel your heart thumping and your blood drain from your face as he said that. "Haha, I'm kidding. You wouldn't even float with me on you let alone have enough of you for me to lie on." That was for sure, he was more than three times your weight and more than twice your height. You shudder at the thought of him actually on top of you.

Suddenly, you could feel something shifting below yourself. You can see and hear the water being pushed beyond the pool deck. That was when you figured Connor was growing once again. You could feel his muscles developing further, becoming more defined and more pronounced. You could hear his bones creaking and muscles straining as they grew to new sizes. Connor was ecstatic, enjoying his growing size.

Water sloshed about as it was displaced by Connor's growing form. In the end Connor occupied more than 2/3 of the pool's length. He had increased in musculature mostly, but had also increased in length. He was in amazement with his new found size and wanted to get it measured. "But we don't have anything to measure your weight with anymore! You destroyed the last one with your weight already." Connor said, "Wait, is that dad's cargo scale over there by the side of the house? Let's use that. Grab the measuring tape as well, I wanna measure my height and my feet as well."

You grabbed all of it, and went to the pool. You could see him casually floating on the pool. You signaled him to come, to which he placed both feet on the pool floor, and stood up. CRACK! You ran over to the pool deck, and saw cracked tiles around where Connor stood, a huge testament to his hulking weight. The waters now came up only to his knees, due to his taller self as well as the displaced water. He got out of the pool and onto the grass. The water level went even lower and was less than half its original volume. His big feet left a sizeable footprint on the grass after every footstep, as he walked towards you. Both of you went to the cargo scale. You could see that it could weigh till 5000 pounds. Looking at him now, he could still use it for the next couple of growth spurts, though he was still pretty heavy, noted by his footprints. The scale was 5'x5', giving his large feet more than enough space to stand on. The needle jumped, settling at a final weight of 1200 pounds! No wonder he cracked the tiles. "Now that's a huge jump haha." Connor said. "Height and feet next, maybe hands too~" he beamed.

You grabbed the bottom of the tape and placed it next to his feet. You could see that his feet did grow by quite a lot as your hands were quite small compared to them, as you placed them on top of his smooth feet. Connor took the top part of the tape and pulled it to his head, locking in the measurement and handing it to you. "You grew by 2 feet and 3 inches, putting you at 15 feet and 9 inches!" Connor beamed with pride as those words left your mouth. Grabbing the tape measure, you went over to his feet, measuring the length of them; about 34.5 inches long and 15 inches wide. His big toe alone was 9.5 inches long! You told him his feet stats, to which he gleefully replied, "YES! My feet are so big NOW! Sorry bro, I just really like having big feet, they're so wide and long. I think I have a foot fetish haha." Looking at his massive stompers, you definitely feel turned on. "To be honest, me too! I really like that your feet are so much bigger than mine, like even your toe itself is more than half the size of my feet! You have very nice feet Connor!" He blushed as you said it. "I know how you like having bigger feet than me, if you want we can go and compare sizes now! Your feet should be a size 70 now!" You added. "That sounds n- RUMBLE"

You suddenly heard a loud rumbling and gurgling sound from Connor, showing how hungry he was. "Aww... Big bro, sorry, I'm feeling very hungry again, could you help me make something to eat?" "No problem, just give me sometime, in the mean time, just chill somewhere first!" You rushed to the kitchen to start the preparation, taking packets of pasta, meat, sauce, and whatever you could find. You hoped to be able to fully satisfy Connor, hence you cooked whatever you could get your hands on.

" Bro! I'm gonna try to go into the house!" he called out. You immediately stopped what you were doing and shouted, "Connor I don't think you can fit in the house anymore. But if you do try, please don't lunge at it like just now, you're more than twice your weight and taller now. You're gonna bring down the whole house if you do. Go slowly." with that, you carried on cooking.

[Connor's POV]

Crouching by the house, you were figuring how you could crawl in. The hole you made was not gonna be able to fit you anymore. You are taller and wider than it. You got down on all fours, and saw that your shoulders would be caught by the side of the hole. You then decided to just slowly push through the hole to widen it. Your shoulders pressed against the walls, groaning as they struggled to withstand your might. It eventually gave way and allowed you to crawl through. After getting your huge feet in the house, you squatted down, having just enough space between the ceiling and your head for you to move about. You wondered how small he would make you for your first task. The shrinking stopped when you were about two feet tall. Connor was more than three feet taller than you and looked big from your perspective, but he was no where near as big as he was at the end of yesterday.

Connor said, "Now that that's done, my little servant's first task will be to..."
152112111221.title: I'll serve you, but I have some rules

1521121112211.content:
Connor said, "Now that that's done, my little servant's first task will be to rub my feet! I wasn't kidding when I told you earlier that I hurt one of them yesterday, so it would be great if you could rub them for me." You looked down at Connor's feet, then looked up at Connor's face and nodded, saying you'd do it. You knelt down in front of Connor's feet and began to rub them. That task was not easy for you considering your size. Connor's feet were pretty big compared to you, you needed to use both of your hands to rub them! You looked up at Connor as you were rubbing his feet, he looked really tall. He was three feet bigger than you after all!

When you finished rubbing his feet, Connor said, "That felt really good John, thanks. You did a really good job! The pain is basically gone now!" You responded, "Thanks Connor, I'm glad your feeling better. So, what do you want me to do next?" Connor giggled as he though about it and said, "For your next task, you have to..."
1521121112211.title: Rub my feet

15211211122111.content:
"For your next task, you have to play a game of my choice, so it's not really a task. This is going to be for my entertainment!" You were a little happy that you got to play a game, but you became a little unsure when Connor said it would be for his entertainment. You said, "Alright, tell me what you have in mind."

Connor sat up and though about it for a second. He smiled and said, "Alright, my idea is that I shrink you down to a really, really tiny size and you have to climb apart of my body in a specific amount of time or else you lose! And if you lose, you have to rub my feet at your really tiny size!" You got pretty worried when Connor shared his idea, you didn't want to become too small, and then have to rub his feet at that tiny size if you lost. It was tough enough to do it two feet tall, it would be a much bigger task at a smaller size. You asked, "Exactly how small would you make me?" Connor responded, "I would make you like a millimeter tall or less, and when I say less I mean like much less." Your eyes widened at the sound of that. How big would Connor look compared to you? How would you even communicate with him? You asked Connor this and he responded that part of his powers are that he would always see and hear you no matter how small you or how big he would be.

You thought about it some more and said, "What body part would you make me climb?" Connor said, "Maybe my nipple or my toe. At the size I'd make you, it would be like you are climbing a mountain!"

You thought about it some more and you came to a decision.

Did you agree to do it or did you refuse?
15211211122111.title: Play a game

152112111221111.content:
You thought about it and you said, "Alright Connor I'll do it, but you have to promise me that it will be safe." Connor smiled and responded, "Don't worry little brother! Everything will be fine, just don't lose!" You were surprised that he called you little brother. That was the first time he'd done that.

Just as you were going to say something else, Connor picked you up and placed you on the floor in front of him. He said, "Are you ready?" You said that you were. He responded, "Alright, good. When you start getting too small, I'm gonna pick you up and hold you in my hand then finish the shrinking." You nodded at Connor and he used his powers to shrink you once again.

You saw Connor get bigger and bigger in front of you as you shrunk shorter than two feet tall. You thought about how small he'd make you and if you made a mistake, but it was too late now. Connor was shrinking you to a very small size and at a faster pace than before. You were shrunk past a foot tall in not time and soon were approaching an inch tall. You saw Connor's feet grow immense in size as his big toe was once much smaller than you, but soon you'd be much smaller than it.

Once you reached an inch tall, Connor knelt down and picked you up. You couldn't believe the size of your younger brother, he was enormous. You were a little shorter than his big toe! His face looked huge to you! One of his eyes looked like the size of a house! He said, "Wow, you look so small little brother! But there is plenty of room for more shrinking for the game, don't you think?" Before you responded, you go the all to familiar feeling and began to dwindle even further. You looked at your surrounding, Connor's hand, and saw it grow more and more. His fingers began to grow to the size of buildings and beyond. You were starting to get close to microscopic size!

Soon, the shrinking stopped and you couldn't believe what you saw. Connor's hand was gigantic. If you had to guess, it would probably take more than three hours to run across it. You looked up at your brother's face, which also looked even more gigantic, and you said, "How small did you make me?" Connor responded, "I made you a millimeter tall little brother!" His voice sounded like thunder to you. Connor said," Good thing I could still hear you and see you no matter how small I make you, you are on the brink of being microscopic!" You said, "I know, please don't lose me! Anyway, have decided what I need to climb for the game?"

Connor said, "Yes, for the game you need to climb my..."
152112111221111.title: Agree

You fight over the last chocolate bar and he shrinks you to nothing
You fight over the TV remote and he shrinks you to one inch tall
1521121112212.content:
Connor was still his normal height at 5-ft-2 but he had used his size-change superpowers to shrink you, his older brother John, down from 6-ft-2 to only 2 feet tall.

So Connor lay on his bed with his face and chest facing up and bare-chested, showing off his pecs and his abdominal muscles.

“Now that you’re small, I want you to rub my muscles! Just do that and I won’t ask anything else today!” He said.

You just groaned for a moment and you finally agreed. Connor was in charge with this weird superpower of his and you didn’t want to make him angry because you knew he would shrink you down if he did.

So, you climbed on top of his chest and you rubbed his pecs and his abs for 20 minutes just to keep him happy. Afterwards, he got bored anyway and he decided to go play games on the Xbox in the living room.

“Hey, can you grow me back to my size? Please?” You asked him.

“Sure…” he mumbled and sure enough you grew from 2 feet tall back to 6-ft-2 in a few seconds.

Everything was normal again until…
1521121112212.title: Rub my muscles

choices: Connor grows you back to only 3 feet tall
Connor grows you back to only 2 feet tall
Connor grows you back to only 6 inches tall
Connor grows you back to only 3 inches tall
15211211122121.content:
The afternoon went by quietly after you finished rubbing Connor’s abs and chest and he decided to use his weird superpowers to grow you back to your original height again. You decided to stay out of his hair, so you retreated to your own bedroom and you grabbed a book to read for school.

After about two hours or so, you got really bored and tired of reading and you decide it was time for some entertainment. You get up and walk into the living room where Connor is quietly playing a round of Fortnite on the Xbox. Or, at least, he was playing. He had gotten up and he was in the kitchen pouring a glass of juice. You figure he was done so you grab the game controller and you start a new game. Just then, he comes back with a glass of juice in his hand which he sets on the coffee table.

“Hey, John! I wasn’t done with my game!” he states.

“Ohh man! Well, let me play a game of Fortnite then.” You say to him.

“But I wasn’t finished! Gimme the controller!” he insisted.

“Ohh come on, Connor! You’ve been playing for the last two hours! Can’t I play one game?” you plead with him.

“I was just getting into it and I was playing with Thanos! You ruined my game! JOHN!!!” Connor shouted angrily.

“Calm down, squirt! You can have it back after I’m done…” you say calmly.

“NO! Gimme the game controller NOW!” he shouted as he grabbed hold of your game controller and tried pulling it out of your hands.

“CONNOR! STOP! Let me finish my freaking game WILL YOU?”

“You didn’t let me finish MINE?” he shouts back.

“LET GO of the controller!”

“NO, YOU let go!”

“CONNOR, STOP!”

Then, Connor just let go of the controller and he stared at you with an evil grin on his face.

“FINE! Just for that, I want you to shrink down TO NOTHING!” Connor shouted.

Ohhh, CRAP!

You had completely forgotten about Connor’s size change superpower!

“Okay! Connor! I’m SORRY! Okay? I’m VERY SORRY!” You plead with him…. But it was already too late as he just stood there and stared at you with a VERY angry look on his face while you saw everything around you grow bigger and bigger…. VERY rapidly.

Soon, the game controller had become too big for you to hold in your hands and you ended up dropping it on the floor. The Xbox, the TV set, the desk, the chair and the coffee table were becoming like…. Gigantic.

Since you were just sitting on the carpet on the living room floor, all you had to do was look UP and you saw that everything was just…. Humongous. And you really mean that.

Soon, all you could see where the pieces of carpet, which were becoming bigger and bigger. It was like you were becoming VERY TINY. You figure you were an inch tall… No, even SMALLER than an inch. How small was Connor making you? You were still shrinking because everything around you was still growing and there was NO slowing down.

Minutes passed and when the shrinkage stopped, you were standing in a forest of wool. You were surrounded by trees which made up the carpet! Holy crap! You were smaller than a bug! You were practically…. A speck of dust! You were shrunk out of existence! Connor had made you so small that nobody could even SEE you. You practically didn’t even exist anymore!

You began to walk through the forest, but you had no idea of where to go. The forest was endless. Occasionally, some large object stepped over the forest above your head, blocking the light and making everything go dark. You figure, that must have been Connor’s foot.

You become really scared now. You think things over and you realize that you REALLY pissed him off this time. How long is he going to make you stay this tiny before he grows you back? All you can do is just wander around the living room carpet. You’re completely at Connor’s mercy now.

“Connor? CONNOR!!” you shout, but you doubt he can hear your voice now that you’re so tiny. You’re miniature. Heck, you’re practically… microscopic! You can only hope he’ll grow you back after he begins to feel lonely… IF he grows you back. You begin to feel helpless….

Luckily for you, after an hour had passed, you begin to feel that weird, tingling sensation all over your body, indicating that you’re growing again. But… How big will Connor make you? Is he still pissed? Will he return you to your size, or smaller?
15211211122121.title: You fight over the Xbox and he shrinks you down...

choices: Connor grows you to 3-foot-6 inches tall
Connor grows you to 3-foot-9 inches tall
Connor grows you to 4-foot-6 inches tall
Connor grows you to 4-foot-9 inches tall
152112111221214.content:
You are scared out of your mind! You were reduced to a speck of dust by your younger brother thanks to his new size-change superpower following a fight over the Xbox game controller. How could you be so STUPID? You pissed off your little brother, Connor, and now he used his weird power to shrink you down to NOTHING! You ended up wandering around aimlessly through the forest of wool, which is the white, living room carpet, which now is like walking around in the Amazon forest. You can only hope that Connor will eventually get hungry or lonely and that he’ll remember to grow you back. It scares you to death that your bro basically wiped you off the face of the earth! He reduced you to nothing! He shrunk you from human existence and you were completely helpless to resist! In other words, Connor is all-powerful and there is no way to stop him! What can you do?

Finally, you begin to feel that tingling sensation. The wool carpet begins to shrink more and more. Your head begins to rise just slightly above the surface of the carpet and things in the living room now begin to take shape again. You have re-joined the human world again, even though you’re still too small to be called a human being.

Suddenly, the growth stopped. You’re still small. The desk, the coffee table and the Xbox are still HUGE for you. What happened? Why aren’t you growing back to your true height? Your brother is in complete control of your height, so you might have to ask him. Speaking of which….

Suddenly, two large feet appear before you. You crane your neck and look up Way UP. It’s Connor. And he stares down at you with an angry look on his face.

He has his arms folded in front of his chest, way up there. Connor is like a true GIANT standing before you.

“Let’s get something straight…” he says calmly. “I AM THE BOSS!” he shouts at you with his booming voice, loud enough to make the room shake.

“Next time you fight with me, I will shrink you down to NOTHING and I’ll KEEP you that way for a couple of HOURS! Is that understood?”

You are trembling with fear. You have NEVER been so scared in your life. Just the thought of your brother erasing you from existence alone is enough to make you sweat like crazy.

You drop to your tiny knees as you clasp your hands together.

“I’m really REALLY sorry, bro…. I will never argue with you again…. Please…. PLEASE grow me back! PLEASE…. I beg you!” you plead with him on your knees.

“I will grow you back…. But NOT to 6 feet tall! I’m gonna keep you shorter than me…. As your punishment! I will grow you bigger than you are now!” Connor replies.

You stand up and feel relieved as you grow. But Connor only grows you to…
152112111221214.title: Connor grows you back to only 3 inches tall

choices: You run into a girl from school, and she teases you
You run into a bully from school, who makes fun of you
You run into your best friend from school, who asks you questions
You run into Connor and his friends, and they make fun of you
1521121112212141.content:
When the tingling finally stops, you look around and realize you’re not back to your full height at 6-foot-2 inches tall. At the same time, you’re much shorter than Connor, who is a foot shorter than you. You freak out and try to figure out how tall you are. You run into your bedroom and you grab a pencil off your very tall desk. You stand with your back against the wall and you mark with the pencil at the top of your head, a line on the wall. Finally, you grab the tape measure and you measure the distance from the floor to the pencil mark.

“WHAT? I’m only three-foot-six inches tall?” you shout out loud. “NO WAY!”

“Yup!” Connor smiles as he pits on his shoes and walks out the door.

“Where are you going?”

“To the park! I’m gonna play soccer with Paul and Kevin! Catch ya later, shorty!” he says, as he strolls out the door, wearing his soccer cleats.

“Holy crap! You gotta grow me back! I’m the size of a little KID!” you shout after him. But… He’s already gone.

You find some small clothes to wear in the guest room. You used to have your little nephew over, who was 5 years old. You can now fit in HIS clothes because you’re literally the size of a little kid.

You dress up in the little shorts, shirt and shoes, and you run out the door. You dash across the street and you run to the park. Your smaller, shorter legs make you tire out quicker, and you’re exhausted by the time you get there.

Once you arrive, you spot a bunch of kids you recognize since they are Connor’s friends and some of them are your friends as well. But…. What will they say when they see you now, in your smaller form?
1521121112212141.title: Connor grows you to 3-foot-6 inches tall

15211211122121413.content:
You’re so mad at Connor for shrinking you down and not growing you back to your full size, which is 6-foot-2 inches tall. Instead, the brat grew you to only three-foot-six and left you like that, meaning you were the size of a toddler! To top it off, he went to the public park down the street to play soccer with is friends, leaving you to fend for yourself. So, what are you to do now?

Walking around the park is a major challenge because the distance seems so much greater, due to your short legs. Not only that, but EVERYONE seems so HUGE now! All you see before you are the legs of the older kids and the adults, because everybody is much taller than you. You’re just way too short now, and you’re determined to find Connor so you can ask him to grow you back to your own size again.

You’re walking around, trying not to get run over by taller kids wearing soccer cleats. You already bump into one kid, who knocks you over. You’re so small, that you have to look UP so you don’t bump into anybody else. You search for Connor as you head to the soccer field, when you suddenly stop because somebody blocks your view.

“John? Is that you?”

All you see is long, muscular legs before you. You crane your neck way up and you recognize the face. It’s Andy, your best friend from high school. He’s 6-foot-4 inches tall and he’s all muscle.

“Hey, Andy… Uhh… I’m in a bit of a rush, dude…” you stutter. “I’m looking for my little bro…”

“What the heck, John? Is that really you?” Andy just grins, as he reaches down with his long arms and lifts you up under your armpits. “How did you get so small?”

“Look man, I’ll explain later, okay?”

But, it’s too late. You feel your feet leave the ground as Andy easily raises you up and holds you over three feet above the ground with your feet dangling in the air.

“DUDE! Set me down, okay? I gotta find Connor!” you utter.

“Look at you, man! You’re the size of a little kid! What happened?” he insisted.

“Look! Connor can shrink me, okay? This is annoying, so that’s why I need to get a hold of him! Can you please put me down, now?” you groan.

“Well, well, look who we have here?” a familiar voice says, coming from behind.

Andy sets me down and we both turn around.

“CONNOR!” I shout at my brother.

“Wow, Connor. Did you shrink John?” Andy asked him.

Connor just folded his arms and smiled.

“Yeah. Wanna see how I did it?” Connor added.

Connor then…
15211211122121413.title: You run into your best friend from school, who ...

152112111223.content:
“How about we date and I’ll do everything you want anyways?” You ask your younger brother.

“Wow! Really?” Connor said as he picked you up and kissed you. You kept kissing Connor for a while then broke it off to respond.

“Yeah! Totally I’ve always wanted a giant boyfriend anyways!”

Connor kissed you again and grew another three feet. “How’s this then? I’d grow bigger but I want to enjoy being with you.” He said as you looked smaller in his hands.

You really like this. You thought as your giant brother now boyfriend had total control over you but chose to love you instead. Until....

Connor threw you on the floor and pressed his foot on your chest. “NOW....about you rubbing my ankle. I’m still in charge here!”

You decided it was best not to argue and started massaging his ankle. Connor started to coo and lighten pressure. “Hey babe....can you grow bigger as I do this? I wanna feel what it’s like seeing ur foot grow bigger!”

Connor smiled and grew another five feet and pressed harder with his feet. You felt like you were going to break until he grabbed you by the neck to kiss you. “You’re mine and that’s not gonna ever change!
152112111223.title: I don't want to serve you...I want you!

154.content:
Connor cracked his fingers while he was in his room, releasing his divine powers once again. We weren't sure why but... Connor had been born with freaky powers, like ridiculous ones. He could literally do anything he wanted, create anything out of thin air, change things and people into other things... pretty much anything he imagined, it was possible. For the most part, reality stayed normal, and he pretty much obeyed my parents and didn't step out of line... but he was pretty wearing. Always getting what he wanted, when he wanted, and sometimes I just want to play video games on my own... but I knew the moment I told him to go away I'd been a complete idiot.

Swallowing, I heard him walk off to his room... this was pretty normal though, he usually forgot about his powers, until he started feeling angry, and then he'd remember what he could do to me. Rubbing his hands together in his room, Connor grinned as the glittered with warm light, walking back down the stairs to the living room where I was, I dived under the pillows, my teeth chattering.

It was pointless though. Seeing I wasn't on the sofa, Connor just grinned, before snapping his fingers, making me appear on the sofa, sitting on top of it.

But that wasn't all he'd done to me. In the space of that finger snap, Connor had taken away my height; shrinking me down so small that I became nothing more than an inch tall, sat shivering in front of my looming, all-powerful, 'little brother'. His arm were crossed over his chest, and he wore a warm, sadistic smile on his face, grinning at me.

'Still think I'm a 'shrimp', Big Bro~?' Connor cooed, giggling as he looked at my terrified expression.

'Look, I-I'm sorry, Connor. I was a real jerk to you, I'm just tired, b-but we can still play that game you wanted, right....?' I swallowed, my teeth chattering as I looked up at the terrifying figure standing over me.

So what happens next just depends... What sort of God is my little brother...?
154.title: Did I forget to mention? My brother's a god.

1541.content:
Connor burst into laughter as he saw my terrified face, wiping a tear from his eye with one of his divinely glowing hands. 'You should of seen the look on your face, bro! You looked so scared! what did you think I was going to do? Go on, tell me~' My huge brother's laughter made my ears hurt, my heart still racing, but I breathed a sigh of relief. He was usually like this, using his powers haphazardly, but then being kind and nice to people whenever he could, including me. I went to answer his question with all manner of terrifying ideas, when his large, smooth fingers reached out towards me. Hoisted up into the air, dropped into his palm, my brother's face loomed large as he beamed at me, swallowing just from the terrifying scale my younger sibling now was.... and in an instant, could be even larger if the fancy took him.

'H-Haha Connor... very good... you got me. Now can you unshrink me? I learned my lesson, I'll play with you. Whatever you want...' I say, sighing as I once again must submit to my brother's rules.

'Hmmm~' Connor hummed, his bright blue eyes seeming to look me over and ponder, before a smile spread over his lips again. 'I wiiiill... but you're kind of cute at this size, Big bro! You don't mind if I keep you this size a bit longer, do you?' Connor said.

'I do don't!' I say back irritably, before my eyes widen at the words that have just come out of my mouth! D-Did he... change them!?

'Great! I knew you'd love this, John!! You'll stay a nice little guy for... the rest of the day? Then I'll change you back!' Connor giggled again

'No way! I'd love that!' Smacking my hands over my mouth as the wrong words came from my lips.

'Great! For now... Let's just play some video games, ok? I'll keep you....'
1541.title: Benevolent God

15412.content:
'How about down by my feet? That shouldn't be too bad, should it?' Connor said, grinning at me.

'Please, not your feet! I'd love that!' I sigh after saying this. I don't think Connor's doing it on purpose... I think it's more that at this size, being held by him, it's physically impossible for me to disagree with him...

'Great! Gimme a sec...'

Connor got settled down on the couch, propping his feet up on the coffee table. Wiggling the toes, Connor sighed, before taking me gently down in his hand, dropping me onto his toes. I can smell the odor around his feet, but it's not unbearable. A little heady and covers the whole area, but I'll manage. His soles are also clean, almost perfectly so, only to occasional drop of sweat beading up from the hot afternoon... Good thing Connor likes the heat, else the world would probably be in an eternal winter by now.

I sigh again, lying draped between his big and second toe, looking over at the screen, as Connor picks up the controller and begins playing, effortlessly beating his way along the level I'd been spending the last hour struggling to get through.

Connor and I sit like this for a while, and I...
15412.title: By my feet!

choices: He doesn't notice... or at least, pretends not to.
154122.content:
After a while of playing, I notice my body beginning to slip. Too late, I feel my self beginning to fall out from between Connor's toes, my younger god brother inopportunely wiggling his toes, sliding me out and down the bottom of his sole, landing in a crumpled mess in front of the boy god's foot. Groaning... I push myself up off our wooden coffee table... when I find myself staring at my brother's feet. The instant I do, I very vividly begin to hear something... like two voices, battling in my head. One is dreamlike, and the other is panicking.

'His feet... look tired. Maybe I could rub them a bit for him?' Staring over the smooth, glistening wall of tanned skin, tightened by the muscles under the surface, each one as big as my bicep.

'No! No way am I rubbing my brother's feet!' Looking at the giant feet I'd been forced to sit at, breathing in the smell of them, while I'd been reduced to less than half their size!

'But... He's nice, and I was pretty rude to him...' Remembering my brother's grinning, joking face from earlier, and all the nice thing's he'd done for me.

'He's a literal god! If he wasn't nice, I'd have ask what he had to be mean about!' Thinking about how easy my brother got it, acing every test, being the most popular kid in school, having literally anything he wanted bought for him, and if not that, falling out of the sky! (though that was only one time... three times.)

'A little rub won't hurt me, I can take it!'

'Noooo!!! If I do this... then he might decide I want him to do all sorts of things to me!'

Unable to stop myself, eventually reaching out and pressing my hands to his smooth, warm soles, rolling my palms over their surfaces, kneading the soft skin with ease.

How does Conner react?
154122.title: Start rubbing his feet

choices: Conner leaves me to keep rubbing.
Conner decides to do something else entirely!
1541221.content:
As I rub and roll my palms against the large surface of Conner's foot, suddenly I hear a rumbling moan... Conner purring as he felt my hands begin to rub against his sole.

'Mm~ Thanks, Big Bro! I was just thinking, a foot rub might be kind of nice... but I didn't even ask you! Did you just think it would be fun to get to rub a big pair of feet, twice your height~?' Conner chuckled, flexing his plump toes over head. Gritting my teeth, I tried to pull my hands away from the surface of his foot, blushing irritably from his teasing, but my hands were glued to his sole. No matter how much I tugged, I couldn't free myself, forced to continue rubbing his feet.

'You used your powers, didn't you! That's why I'm- Y-Yeah... I just wanted to make you comfortable, little guy~' I groan at the sweet words that come out of my mouth, my brothers powers making me into his perfect little servant; inadvertently or otherwise. Digging my palms into his sole, Conner only sighs more.

Several minutes go by, and I feel my body tiring from the difficult physical labor of rubbing the enormous foot I'm standing opposite. With Conner's toes being an entire body length above me, I have to climb up his smooth sole, grappling my way up against the hot surface, getting covered in my brother's foot sweat. Soon, I feel like I want to let go and drop off onto the table, panting and gasping from the effort... but I can't. My body refuses to let me stop worshiping my all powerful brother, no matter how tired I get....

What happens next?
1541221.title: He notices.

choices: Rub his feet with the duplicate
15412212.content:
Obviously having noticing something, I hear Conner's voice speak up again, vibrating the air around me.

'Hey, you ok, big bro? You've been slowing down a bit, I don't want you to get too tired, just giving me a foot rub.' He said sincerely, obviously not thinking about how demeaning it was for me to hear that sentence out loud. Panting and gasping, I hesitate to respond... knowing that I'll probably say something stupid like 'I'm fine!' if I do... Conner's voice echos on though.

'John...? You ok down there...? Please speak to me.' He says, and my lips automatically start to move against my will.

'A-Actually, I am getting a bit tired... your feet are a bit much to manage on my own!' I respond, surprised that I was allowed to speak my true feelings for once... all be it less loud, and aggressive.

'No problem! Take a break, you've been doing great!' Conner giggles in response, my hands and body suddenly detaching from my brother's foot, fall the short distance down onto the wooden coffee table, with a light SLAM. Groaning... I roll over onto my back, looking up at the enormous stomper still standing tall over me, light from the ceiling fixture creating god rays between my brothers plump, flexing toes.

Finally getting a moment to myself, I suddenly feel energy surge through my body, my heart rate slowing down and my breath returning, my tired muscles fixing and restoring themselves... I feel great! And I know what that usually means... hearing the warm voice of Conner over his feet.

'Feel better now? I used my powers to give you some more energy, big bro! And that's not all... since you mentioned its a hard job to do on your own, I brought you some back up!' Chuckling to himself, while I wonder what he means, looking around before seeing... Myself.

Across from me, standing over at one of Conner's ginormous feet, I see myself standing, ready to rub my giant brother's other foot. He made a duplicate of me! Surprised, I wave at myself, who mirrors my actions almost exactly.

'You were doing a great job, but only on one of my feet... I figured getting a rub on both of my feet would be even better! Buuut... If you really dont want to, we can do something else!'
15412212.title: Conner makes my job easier.

choices: Connor teases you using his powers more
Connor decides to shrink you more
154122121.content:
You look up to your God brother's foot, not wanting to rub another inch of it. Even if he did make a duplicate of you, you didn't want to rub your younger brother's foot, it's humiliating. You try to say you didn't want to but the words that came out of your mouth said, "I love your giant feet Connor! I'll rub them some more, having a duplicate will definitely make it easier!" You sigh in frustration, not being able to control what you say. Connor smiles far above you and says, "Good! I'm glad to hear that you love my feet John! I'm surprised you like spending so much time down there!"

You roll your eyes and walk toward Connor's giant foot and start rubbing. Your hands and feet attach to it once again and you begin Connor's second foot rub. You look over to you giant brother's other foot and see your duplicate is matching your movements exactly. Connor was getting the double foot rub he wanted! Connor laid his head back in relaxation as he enjoyed his foot rubs from his little, older brothers.

After a little while, you finished rubbing Connor's foot. You and your duplicate had rubbed every part of the giant stomper, even Connor's tall toes. You wondered what he was going to make you do next.

What happened next?
154122121.title: Rub his feet with the duplicate

choices: A game where he builds a miniature world for you.
A game where he makes clones of himself.
A game where he does something else with his powers.
1541221211.content:
Connor continued playing the game while you rubbed, but he beat it before you'd finished. A perfect score, never dying once, naturally. And he didn't even cheat... it just seemed like his brain operated on a higher plane than yours... or anyones. Able to beat a game even if he'd never picked up the controller before. Noticing that you and... you, hadn't finished rubbing his godly feet yet, Connor simply chuckled, leaving you to rub and pamper him a little longer. He felt a little bad, but from what he could see, you weren't complaining, and you were doing a really good job!

As you finally finished, Connor clapped his hands, the mirror of you on his other foot disappearing from existence, like it had never been there to begin with. 'Nice job, big bro! You did a super nice job, rubbing my feet!'

You smile up at your brother, to try and disguise your humiliation and irritation at you almighty younger. 'Thanks... Connor... Does that mean I can have my size back now...?' managing to get the words out un-corrupted.

Connor doesn't say anything for a moment, frowning. He likes having you this size... you're cute and you're playing with him! But... he can understand why being so tiny isn't so fun for you... placing a finger to his lips, he finally snaps his finger, beaming at you from over his toes.

'I'll grow you back, John, but only if you play a game with me first!' Connor said... as you sigh.

Not even bothering to retort you say, 'Fine, what do you want to play?'
1541221211.title: Connor teases you using his powers more

choices: You explore for a bit, nothing happens...
15412212111.content:
Placing a finger against his chin as he though, Connor's eyes lit up, wiggling his toes so you fall off his foot. Thinking you're going to slam against the table, you brace yourself... but instead you float gently onto the wooden table, landing with a gentle thump. Connor gets up and sits down on the floor in front of you, his beaming face grinning at you. 'Ok, we're gonna play a game of Knight and Dragon!'

You blink at this, the enormous head of your brother filling your vision. 'K-Knight and Dragon...? I don't remember how you play that game...' Certain you've never heard of it before.

'That's cause I just came up with it, silly! You're the Knight, I'm the Dragon! You've got to protect the town from me, and try and slay me!' Connor giggled, while your eyes bulged from your head. You had to... fight your brother!? While he was this size? You probably couldn't beat his little finger, even at normal size!

'If you win, I'll grow you back... and grant you one wish! But if you loose... I'll still grow you back, just tomorrow. And until then, you've gotta play more games with me, ok?' Connor's smile was really wide, you couldn't help but feel the need to please him.

'All right... but if we play more games, I want to be able to grow back if I win those, ok? And also, once the game starts, no using your powers!' You barter, Connor thinking for a moment.

'I mean, I'll need some of my powers for the game to work... but I think I understand what you mean, big bro! I won't cheat, I promise!' You sigh with relief. The fundamentals of reality will change before Connor breaks a promise... literally.

'Ok, so first of all... the town!' Connor giggle, spinning his finger in a wide circle in the air, surrounding you, and covering a lot of the coffee table. You're too busy looking at this to notice a circle on the table is appearing in golden light... as things begin to rise out of the wood around you...! Houses, buildings, a whole old-timey town having appeared out of nowhere, spread out before you colossal brother. You look around... the town is a bit small for you, even at your inch size... in fact, the miniature people within it are about the same size to you as you are to Connor! Trying to wrap you head around it, you here your brother say something.

'Whoops... guess that was a bit smaller than I meant it to be... sorry, big bro... But I'm gonna have to make you just a liiiittle bit smaller for the game to work... you don't mind do you...?' Connor said, as he snapped his fingers, instantly reducing you to an even titchier size, your once shorter god brother now looming above you like the sky itself. You're practically the size of lint compared to him now!

'So, I've got to destroy all of the buildings, one by one~ I'll use just my fingers to do it!' Connor boomed, waggling all ten of his fingers on high to show you what he meant. 'You've got to get a hit in on each my digits... with this!' He said, snapping his fingers again, to kit you out with a shortsword...!

'Wow! Connor, I don't wanna hurt you!' you said, but Connor waved his hand.

'Dont worry about it, bro! It'll be a tiny cut, and I can regenerate any damage after the game! Not like I'm going to get an infection or anything.' Connor dismissed your concerns, before adding something.

'Oh, by the way. While to me, it'll look like I'm just poking houses on a table, you're kind of in a different dimension. So what you see might be different...' Connor explained, making your head spin.

'What do you mean...?' You ask, confused

'I mean... it might look like an ogre is attacking the town, or a dragon is breathing fire over it, or it might just look like I'm poking a house from between the clouds.' Connor giggled. 'Make sure to tell me what it was like for you, I'm kinda curious!'

With that, Connor snapped his fingers, the clouds suddenly turning grey and thick, covering his face up from view, leaving you stranded in the town on your coffee table...
15412212111.title: A game where he builds a miniature world for you.

choices: You hit the dragon, defeating it!
The dragon destroys the whole town. You lose.
154122121112.content:
You are extremely confused... and a little scared. Could you die during this game? Connor had done dangerous stuff before with his powers, but this was kinda different... or at least, it felt like it. A different dimension? Real monsters? A freaking sword!? You guessed you just had to trust your brother on this one... all you needed was one blow on each finger right? So every monster you faced should go down in one hit!

Just as you were thinking that, you heard a scream. Running towards where the sound came from, you heard a loud snarl, as well as heat... rounding the corner, you see a dragon! Ten times the size of any of the houses, and spewing fire! Your eyes bulge as you see this, before the dragon suddenly starts to flap up into the air...! Flying quickly out of your reach, you watch as the dragon hovers over the town... before flying overhead, spewing fire! Charging over the town, leaving a literal line of destruction down the middle of the town. Was that Connor just swiping his finger across the town!? Either way... you couldn't leave that thing charging about!

You run after the dragon, not sure what you're going to do... but you'll figure something out!
154122121112.title: A giant monster starts attacking!

1541221213.content: He forces you to make love or fight to the death with your duplicate for his amusement
1541221213.title: Something else

choices: Turned you into a piece of footwear
1542.content:
"Oh big brother, I've told before to always listen to me and what I say, and you obviously haven't learned a lesson yet, so I must punish you, in order to put you in your place" Connor spoke. Punishment? John had no clue what Connor was going to do, all he knew was that it was going to be bad.
"Please you can't do this Connor!" John yelled, but Connor didn't care, and with a snap of his fingers, John punishment was...
1542.title: Malevolent God

15421.content: What did he transform you into
15421.title: Turned you into a piece of footwear

choices: 14 years old, awkward years for you
A baby, but with the same mental age
15422.content: How young did he turn you
15422.title: Little big brother

choices: You try to yell up to Connor again
You decide just to stay put
1543.content:
Connor looked down at you for another moment and then grabbed he controller you were using to play video games, sat down on the couch, put his feet up on the table (where you now stood), and began playing the video game. You stood there scared about what Connor was going to do with you, now that you were only an inch tall, standing in front of his now gigantic feet.

You yell up to Connor, "Connor! I'm sorry, can you just make me my normal size?! I'll play a game with you!" You all of a sudden felt strange again and saw Connor's feet were growing in front of you, Connor was making you smaller again. He wasn't even paying attention to you! When Connor heard your now tiny voice yell from down at his feet, he decided not to bother with answering. He figured if you were smaller, he wouldn't have to hear you! He was just going to ignore you! This is something that he did with you quite often though.

You continued to shrink until you were about 3/4 of an inch tall. In reality, it wasn't much but Connor looked a whole lot bigger, and that was scary! The smell of his feet was even worse than before, it's like he hadn't washed them in years! You knew you had to grow back to normal now! You decided you needed to get him to see you so you could get his attention. Then you could apologize and he may grow you back to normal!

What happened next?
1543.title: Neutral God

info.brief_description: Your younger brother finds ways to change your size! (Formerly Giant Little Brother)
info.description:
You: John
Age:16
Normal Height: 6'2"

Younger Brother: Connor
Age: 12
Normal Height: 5'2"

While their parents are away, John has to look after his younger brother, Connor. Things get difficult though when Connor discovers a way to shrink his older brother!

Please Add! Will give gift points for additions!

There are now over 16,000 views! Thank you so much for reading the story!

The story has also gotten to 200 chapters! A huge thank you to everyone who has contributed to the story. It means a lot. I hope to continue seeing additions to this interactive. Remember, gift points are available for additions! Thanks again to those who have added.

Rules:
1) No Female Giants
2) Do not kill main character
3) No one sentence chapters, unless necessary. No gift points will be given for these!
4) Don't end the story, I want the story to keep going!
5) No Size Limit, make John as small as you want. Growing Connor is also allowed.

Other than that, everything else is allowed! Add whatever you'd like!

Enjoy the story and please add!
